author: raybull
body:
No es broma: un grupo de premios de 2,000 SBD y cualquier persona que pueda hacer una publicación, ¡pueden unirse a la diversión!

En solo 14 días comenzará el mayor evento deportivo del mundo: la Copa Mundial de Fútbol celebrada en Rusia.


![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYxRMPnd9m9y24yNnSjEUSkwP1AzNdoC1acioaGAqQ9La/blob)

A @blocktrades  @acidyo y @anomadsoul  son los pioneros organizando este tipo de desafíos , y brindan a la colectividad del mundo a unirse. #siguelos.

No es obligatorio ser un experto en deportes, ni en análisis solamente , es tu punto de vista de los resultados de los juegos y a concursar.
Es muy fácil: en la copa del mundo hay dos etapas, La Etapa de Grupo y La Etapa de Knockout.

Para la Etapa grupal de esta copa de @blocktrades, es sencillo solo tienes que hacer tus pronósticos de juegos, aquí tienes el listado de los partidos¡¡

Russia v Saudi Arabia
Egypt v Uruguay
Morocco v Iran
Portugal v Spain
France v Australia
Argentina v Iceland
Peru v Denmark
Croatia v Nigeria
Costa Rica v Serbia
Germany v Mexico
Brazil v Switzerland
Sweden v South Korea
Belgium v Panama
Tunisia v England
Poland v Senegal
Colombia v Japan

Australia v Peru
Nigeria v Argentina
Iceland v Croatia
South Korea v Germany
Mexico v Sweden
Serbia v Brazil
Switzerland v Costa Rica
Japan v Poland
Senegal v Colombia
England v Belgium
Panama v Tunisia

W (para ganar), L (para perder) y T (para empate) en cada juego. Así es la manera de darle tu visto bueno  a cada juego.

  REGLAS PRINCIPALES DEL DESAFÍO

 El titulo de las publicaciones del desafío deben ser:La Copa Mundial @blocktrades | Mis selecciones
El enlace de este anuncio debe ser agregado a su publicacion.
Usa las etiquetas blocktradesworldcup y la etiqueta mypicks.
 Resteem esta publicación. 
La publicación una vez la coloque en la pagina, no puede ser editada.
Reputación minima de partipacion (40) , para evitar los robots.
Puede enviar su entrada hasta el 14 de junio de 2018 a las 00:01 a.m., zona horaria UTC.


 Para mayor informacion ingresa [aqui](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes)

author: art-s
body:
### <center> لا تمزح: تجمع جائزة 2000 SBD وأي شخص يمكنه المشاركة ، يمكنه المشاركة في المرح! 

<center> في 14 يومًا فقط ، سيبدأ أكبر حدث رياضي في العالم: <b> يحتفل بكأس العالم لكرة القدم في روسيا 

 https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png 
<مركز> <الفرعية> <الفرعية> [المصدر] (https://talksport.com/football/russia-world-cup-2018-fixtures-dates-kick-off-time-stadium-group-stage-match) 

<div class = "text-justify"> @ blocktrades يحب أن يرعى هذا النوع من المشاريع المجتمعية الجذابة وacidyo &anomadsoul يعرف الكثير من Steemians يحبون هذه اللعبة ، لذلك قررنا تنظيم هذا الحدث الهائل لكأس العالم لكرة القدم. <hr >

لا يتعين عليك أن تكون محللًا مهنيًا للعبة ، لا يضطر فريقك الوطني للمشاركة ، فأنت لا تحتاج إلى معرفة الكثير عن كرة القدم للانضمام ... 

كل ما عليك القيام به هو كتابة مشاركة اختيار كل الفائز في المباراة ، و Steemian الذي يجعل أكبر عدد من النقاط ، يفوز.

## <center> بسيطة مثل ذلك 

#### <center> Heyacidyo ، أريد قطعة من تلك الـ 2،000 SBD ، كيف يمكنني الانضمام؟ </ مركز> <hr>

الأمر سهل للغاية: في كأس العالم ، هناك مرحلتان ، هما <b> Group Stage  و  مرحلة خروج المغلوب 

بالنسبة إلى  Group Stage  من هذا blocktrades cup  ، كل ما عليك فعله هو إنشاء مشاركة مع توقعات المطابقة  في كل من هذه المباريات:

<center> هل هناك أي قواعد؟ @ anomadsoul مهلا ،  </center>

<center>: نعم ، هناك بعض القواعد البسيطة : </center>

## <center> القواعد  </center><hr>

1. The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections    يجب أن يكون عنوان رسالتك هو       

2 - في رسالتك ، يجب عليك تضمين رابط لهذا الإعلان.

3 - استخدم التنسيق المضمن في الرابط أعلاه حتى نتمكن من تنظيم كل إدخال.

4 -  blocktradesworldcup و علمة  mypicks   استخدم العلامات 

5 - استرك  هذا المنصب. نحن نريد أن يكون لدينا مئات من الإدخالات.

6 - بمجرد إنشاء المنشور ، لا يمكنك تحريره. لذا يرجى التفكير في اختيارك جيدًا قبل النشر.

7 - الحد الأدنى من السمعة للمشاركة هو 40. هذا هو لتجنب السير من الانضمام.}

8 - يمكنك إرسال المشاركة الخاصة بك حتى 14 يونيو 2018 في 00:01 صباحا بتوقيت UTC.

التسجيل: لكل اختيار صحيح تقوم به في Group Stage ، ستحصل على نقطة واحدة (1). في نهاية الكأس ، ستوزع مجموعة الجوائز بين أعلى هدافين في ستايميانز. سيعتمد المكافأة على عدد الإدخالات التي نحصل عليها.

Hey @ blocktrades ، ماذا عن المرحلة الثانية من الكأس ،  مرحلة خروج المغلوب ؟
تنتهي المجموعة  في 28 يونيو (بتوقيت روسيا) وتبدأ المرحلة  في 30 يونيو. لذلك سنعلن عن هذا الحساب بعد 28 يونيو لنعلمك كيف تعمل مرحلة خروج المغلوب.

يمكن لأي شخص الانضمام إلى المرحلتين وسيتم تحديد الفائزين من خلال مجموع النقاط في كلا المرحلتين.

حظا طيبا للجميع والسماح للتوقعات تبدأ!

 يمكنك إرسال مشاركتك حتى 14 يونيو 2018 في 00:01 صباحًا بتوقيت UTC 

هذه مسابقة ترعاها @blocktrades ، إذا كنت تحب ما يفعله ، صوّت لـ @blocktrades كإثبات [هنا] (https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

هذه مسابقة تنظمها @acidyo & @anomadsoul ، إذا كنت تحب ما نقوم به ، فقم بالتصويت لـ @ocd-witness كشاهد [هنا] (https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

body:
It came to our attention that a lot of people are making mistakes while submitting their predictions so, if someone gets a comment by @superoo7-dev telling them there are some mistakes in their post...

## <center>You are allowed to edit your post</center><hr>

If you don´t know what error you made, check out these steps:

1 - The names of all the teams must be in ENGLISH.

2 - The letters you use in your match predictions must be W, L and T (For win, lose and tie).

3 - You must not include scores on this predictions post.

4 - Do not use BOLD or ITALIC format.

5 - By all means, use the format included here to make your post, its easier for you and for us to keep track of everyone´s predictions this way.

If you have a question, please read the post by @superoo7 [CLICK HERE](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@superoo7/development-extracting-data-of-blocktrades-world-cup)

author: saiful46
body:
![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)
<center>[source image](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@anomadsoul/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections)</center>

Что можно сказать о футболе? Это самый популярный вид спорта во всем мире, и, осталось всего десять дней до начала чемпионата мира, эмоции начинают проявляться, и миллионы поклонников со всего мира остаются ожиданными того, что обещает стать началом события год: Инаугурационный матч между Россией, страной, принимающей Кубок, и аутсайдером Саудовской Аравии. За последние несколько месяцев многое произошло, и мы видели почти все: национальные команды, которые будут участвовать в первый раз, такие как Панама; игроки, участвующие в спорных решениях, таких как Раджа Наингголан из Бельгии, Лерой Сане из Германии и Златан Ибрагимович из Швеции, которые были исключены из своих национальных команд; некоторые исторические команды разочаровали миллионы поклонников и не претендовали на эту большую партию, среди которых у нас есть Чили, Нидерланды и Италия.

<center>![1111.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYj7xBY6p4sXTmsv1225y4m4w4DRm5BEwHmwGsHXA4pyz/1111.jpg)</center>

<center>[source image](https://www.google.com/search?client=opera&hs=Mft&tbm=isch&sa=1&ei=L4gWW_2GNtHz9QOv47DACQ&q=gambar+lapangan+piala+dunia+2018&oq=gambar+lapangan+piala+dunia+2018&gs_l=img.3...416842.422209.0.422820.13.12.1.0.0.0.249.1770.3j7j2.12.0....0...1c.1.64.img..0.2.400...0j0i67k1j0i7i30k1j0i8i7i30k1.0.cbe7TUZ_bvE#imgrc=xzVO9DCrU4Lr6M:)</center>

Этот кубок мира, который будет отмечаться в России с 14 июня по 15 июля, станет 21-м изданием этого турнира 1930 года, который отмечается в Уругвае. Многое изменилось после того, как первое мероприятие собрало лучших футболистов мира, от числа национальных команд, участвующих в средствах массовой информации, используемых для передачи игр все больше и больше людей каждые 4 года.

На протяжении многих лет этот конкурс развивается рука об руку с предстоящими технологиями, и это издание будет очень особенным, потому что это будет первый раз, когда VAR Tech - Virtual Assisted Referee - будет использоваться, чтобы помочь судьям-судьям сделать внутрипартийные решения , VAR - это система, которая позволяет рефери останавливать игру, поэтому специальный стенд может повторно следить за целью, сомнительной игрой, фолом или любым спорным решением судьи. Эта критически настроенная технология, используемая в других видах спорта, таких как американский футбол, определенно приносит пользу турниру, но, с другой стороны, огромная часть фэндомов, игроков, журналистов и людей, связанных с футболом, не любит использование технологий , Нам еще предстоит увидеть, как Кубок мира развивается с использованием этой технологии в качестве помощника по принятию решений.

<center>![1,.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmb6xLAb2cQoi5SouHviVvZTWeY8pS5qUczyftXwTc7kEU/1,.jpg)</center>
<center>[source image](https://www.google.com/search?client=opera&tbm=isch&sa=1&ei=2okWW6f7Kojc9QO1sq_4Cg&q=gambar+seponsor+piala+dunia+2018&oq=gambar+seponsor+piala+dunia+2018&gs_l=img.3...361421.365711.0.366239.8.8.0.0.0.0.380.1407.2j3j2j1.8.0....0...1c.1.64.img..0.1.161...0i7i30k1.0.GYfEwnvuPCQ#imgrc=Erd-lKsjfCC6IM:)</center>
Стоит упомянуть, что с того момента, как Россия была выбрана в качестве хозяина этого огромного события, споры начали кипеть вокруг решения ФИФА. Зачем? Ну, некоторые люди заявляют, что слишком много политических вопросов, связанных с включением меньшинства, и некоторые из законов страны слишком строги - для празднования мирового кубка - для туристов, посещающих эту красивую и холодную страну.

Эти жалобы являются понятными. Кубок мира - это событие, которое вызывает большинство людей со всех уголков мира, с каждой этнической точки зрения, которую вы можете себе представить, и все они имеют культурные различия между собой, поэтому следует ожидать, что условия будут благоприятными для люди, посещающие страну. По этой причине некоторые люди говорят, что этот кубок мира станет одним из самых последовательных в истории этого события не только из-за прекрасного вида спорта, но и из-за политических последствий, которые приходят с ним.

<center>![1,,,.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmR7uGNN6Dg6WiPKUFwrAtNBhQyKi2GJgYfGavsjrZG7nA/1,,,.jpg)</center>
<center>[source image](https://www.google.com/search?client=opera&tbm=isch&sa=1&ei=TIsWW8ChHpT59QO6haLQBA&q=gambar+pengemar+piala+dunia+2018&oq=gambar+pengemar+piala+dunia+2018&gs_l=img.3...238106.240641.0.242445.8.8.0.0.0.0.183.1066.2j6.8.0....0...1c.1.64.img..0.2.222...0i7i30k1j0i8i7i30k1.0.F2kc4kv1d-M#imgrc=Dt6z6wPOFLGrSM:)</center>

Кубок мира по футболу - это то, что каждая страна хочет принять не только из-за очевидных экономических выгод, которые он приносит стране и ее людям в виде туризма, постоянных и временных рабочих мест, обмена валюты и т. Д., Но и из-за радости и развлечение оно приносит людям.

Четыре года назад на Кубке мира в Бразилии в 2014 году было 3,42 миллиона туристов, сразу после празднования в США в 1994 году с 3,59 миллионами обслуживающего персонала. На этот раз в прогнозе туризма ожидается 3,7 миллиона туристов, в основном из США, Китая, Мексики, Уругвая, Аргентины и Бразилии. Имейте в виду, что ни США, ни Китай не претендовали на это издание.

Этот год окажется историческим для истории футбола, и вы не перестанете слышать об этом всюду, особенно Steemit, так как мы планируем провести на нашем чемпионате Worl Cup более 2 тысяч участников со всего мира. У нас будет много вопросов для дебатов - по которым мы надеемся, что некоторые из вас присоединятся - и мы будем предоставлять игровые призывы, предматчевые отзывы и, конечно же, все известные турниры по прогнозированию кубка мира по бильярду.

## We are organizing a Contest with a 2,000 SBD prize pool. If you want to join this contest, [click here](https://steemit.com/@blocktrades).
------------------------

This is a @blocktrades sponsored contest, if you like what he is doing, vote for @blocktrades as witness [here](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

This is an @acidyo & @anomadsoul organized contest, if you like what we are doing, vote for @ocd-witness as witness [here](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

author: worldcup-russia
body:
https://eldiariony.files.wordpress.com/2017/11/2018-fifa-world-cup-russia-2018-emblem-logo-soccer-e1510901965685.jpg?quality=60&strip=all&w=800
[Source](https://eldiariony.files.wordpress.com/2017/11/2018-fifa-world-cup-russia-2018-emblem-logo-soccer-e1510901965685.jpg?quality=60&strip=all&w=800)
What´s there to say about Football? This is the most popular sport in the whole world and, with only ten days left until the World Cup starts, emotions are beginning to show and millions of fans from all over the world remain expectant of what promises to be the beginning of the event of the year: The inaugural match between Russia, the Country hosting the Cup, and the underdog Saudi Arabia. A lot has happened in the past few months and we´ve seen pretty much everything: National teams that will participate for the first time such as Panama; players involved in controversial decisions like Radja Nainggolan from Belgium, Leroy Sane from Germany and Zlatan Ibrahimovic from Sweden, who were left out of their national teams; some Historic Teams dissappointed millions of fans and didn´t qualify for this big party, among them we have Chile, the Netherlands and Italy.
https://cdn2.img.sputniknews.com/images/105399/02/1053990298.jpg
[Source](https://cdn2.img.sputniknews.com/images/105399/02/1053990298.jpg)
This world cup, to be celebrated in Russia from June 14th to July 15th, will be the 21st edition of this tournament born in 1930 celebrated in Uruguay. A lot has changed since that first event gathering the best football players in the world, from the number of national teams participating to the media used to transmit the games to more and more people every 4 years.
Throughout the years, this competition has evolved hand by hand with the upcoming technology and this edition will be very special because it will be the first time that the VAR Tech - Virtual Assisted Referee - will be used to help human referees make in-game decisions. The VAR is a system that allows the referees to stop the game so a special booth can re-watch a goal, a doubtful play, a foul or any controversial decision taken by a referee. This highly criticized technology used in other sports such as the American Football, definitely brings value to the tournament but, on the other hand, a huge part of the fandom, players, journalists and people related to football don´t like the use of technology. We are yet to see how the World cup develops using this tech as a decision making helper.
https://cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/171128104503-rostov-arena-russia-2018-fifa-world-cup-super-169.jpg
[Source](https://cdn.cnn.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/171128104503-rostov-arena-russia-2018-fifa-world-cup-super-169.jpg)
It´s worth mentioning that from the moment Russia got selected as host of this huge event, controversy started to boil around the FIFA decision. Why? Well, some people are stating that there are too many political issues regarding minoritie´s inclusion and some of the country´s laws are too strict - for a world cup celebration - for tourists visiting this beautiful and cold country. These complains are understandale. The world cup is the event that summons the most people from every corner of the world, from every ethnic background you can imagine and all of them have cultural differences between each other, so it´s to be expected that the conditions are favorabel for the people visiting the country. For this particular reason, some people are saying that this world cup will be one of the most followed ones in the history of the event, not only because of the beautifulness of the sport, but because of the political implications that come with it.
http://diariometro.com.ni/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/GettyImages-805540532.jpg
[Source](http://diariometro.com.ni/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/GettyImages-805540532.jpg)
A football world cup is something that every country wants to host, not only because of the obvious economic benefits it brings to the country and its people in form of tourism, permanent and temporary jobs, currency exchange etc, but also because of the joy and amusement it brings to the people. Four years ago, the world cup celebrated in Brazil in 2014 had 3.42 million tourists, just behind the one celebrated in the USA in 1994 with 3.59 million attendants. This time, the tourism forecast is expecting to have 3.7 million tourists, mainly fans from the US, China, México, Uruguay, Argentina and Brazil - bear in mind that neither the US nor China qualified for this edition. This year will prove to be historic for the football history and you won´t stop hearing about it everywhere, especially Steemit, since we are planning to have on our @blocktrades Worl Cup more than 2 thousand participants from all over the world. We´ll have plenty of subjects up for debate - on which we hope some of you join - and we will be providing game revies, pre-match opinions and of course, the all known @blocktrades world cup prediction tournament. ###
What are you waiting for? Start following @worldcup-russia
#
We are organizing a Contest with a 2,ooo SBD prize pool. If you want to join this contest, [click here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes).
This is a @blocktrades sponsored contest, if you like what he is doing, vote for @blocktrades as witness [here](https://steemit.com/~witnesses) This is an @acidyo & @anomadsoul organized contest, if you like what we are doing, vote for @ocd-witness as witness here [here](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

author: worldcup-russia
body:
Every four years there´s a group of players that nobody wants to miss out on their performance and this world cup is no exception. The world cup is the best place to showcase a player´s abilities, whether it is with the intention of becoming famous, to get a better contract with their current team, to catch the headhunters attention or just to rise their price in the market, but this event is definitely the best chance for a player to stand out among the crowd.
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/http://www.la-razon.com/marcas/Lionel-Neymar-Cristiano-Ronaldo-Rusia_LRZIMA20171011_0008_11.jpg
[Source]()
One thing is to be the best player in a National league where there´s more than 30 games a year to get in shape, find your best level, understand your teammates and grasp completely the team gameplay. It´s another thing, absolutely different to play a tournament where you only have 3 games to do your best, finf your mojo and give everything striving to reach the next round, where having one single bad day could mean having to go back home rather than advancing to the knockout stage.
In a world cup, the players face the hardest exam of their lives, where the all their talents and skills are put to the test but, what really differentiates a good player from a great player is the mentality and attitude towards the games, towards certain situations, when facing a negative score... In a world cup the mind is as important as the body, which is why we decided to bring you a list of the players we consider have both, body and mind, which will allow them to lead their teams to victory. Their teammates are counting on them, the team´s performance vastly depends on these players´s performance. *** *** *** #### 10- HARRY KANE:
The most expensive player of the world at this moment made his debut with the National team in march 2015 and, being only 24 years old he arrives in the best shape ever. After a great season playing for the Tottenham Hotspurs where he became a forward reference, a lot of international clubs will be paying close attention to him, an outstanding performance could land him a big contract with one of the big European clubs. The problem for England, at least in the past 4-5 world cups, is that they just can´t find a proper forward, a player who can actually define games on his own - like some of the players you´ll see on this list - and this world cup is his best chance to prove himself and become England´s indisputable key forward player. He won´t be alone, we won´t have to carry the team´s weight all by himself, he´ll have a great partner in Raheem Sterling and most likely, England´s performance will depend on how well these two amazing players understand each other in the field.
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://sc2.elpais.com.uy/files/article_default_content/uploads/2017/09/11/59b61fc14109a.jpeg
[Source]()
#### 9- ROBERT LEWANDOWSKI:
This 29 year old Polish player played a key role in Poland´s world cup qualifier. He was the top scorer in the European qualifying stage with 16 goals. He is the reason Denmark ended up being a runner up instead of qualifying directly even though statistically, Denmark was the favorite to win that group. Perhaps Robert isn´t on hist best career moment but he indeed arrives to this compromise with a matureness that only age and experience in the game can give you; it´s worth noting that this is Lewandowsky´s first world cup and its certain he´ll give his everything to help his team reach the knockout stage, a team that relies on teamwork despite having the Bayern Munich forward star on their ranks.
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://www.futboltotal.com.mx/wp-content/uploads/2017/11/robert-lewandowski-baja-polonia.jpg
[Source]()
#### 8- MOHAMED SALAH:
Mohamed Salah´s case is a very sad one because he was probably one of the players that promised the most for this world cup, regrettably, in the football world, it´s not uncommon to see this happening quite frequently at the end of the season; the heavy workload and the absurd number of games a top player has to play is the main reason for players burning out and in some cases, get injuries they wouldn´t get if they had a proper rest time between matches. It was almost 30 years, since the world cup in Italy in 1990, that Egypt didn´t qualify to a world cup until now, and the whole team and the country knows this is mainly thanks to Salah and his amazing abilities and leading skills. Several media and journalists have stated that the Pharaoh´s recovery is expected for the 3rd game of the Group stage against Saudi Arabia, so if everything works out well for Egypt and Salah´s teammates have a positive outcome in the previous games against Uruguay and Russia, we´ll be able to enjoy the Pharao´s football in the knockout stage.
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://televisa.brightspotcdn.com/dims4/default/01adc08/2147483647/strip/true/crop/5711x3211+25+0/resize/820x461!/quality/90/?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftelevisa.brightspotcdn.com%2F9a%2F69%2F58215ecf4263bc2629b11d8e32a0%2Fmohamed-salah-egipto-mundial-prelista-ap.jpg
[Source]()
#### 7- ROMELU LUKAKU:
This 25 year old thundering forward faces his second world cup, where he expects to become the destructive forward Belgium desperately needs to actually be a serious candidate to win the World Cup. In a team full of stars, Lukaku faces an easier path to become the top scorer of the competition, being surrounded of players the size of Kevin De Bruyne or Eden Hazard, which makes Romelu a must follow man during this tournamente. Last world cup, this player that Manchester United paid 85 million euro for, played 4 games and scored one goal, hopefully this time he lives up to the expectations we all have for him.
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/http://images.rpctv.com/mundial2014/Lukaku-marco-goles-Belgica_MEDIMA20140526_0228_5.jpg
[Source]()
#### 6- LUIS SUAREZ:
8 games, 5 goals and 2 assists. These are the statistics this 31 year old Uruguayan crack has for himself. Luis started small and became big in every sense of the word and we hope that age is no exception and we get to see a mature and centered Suarez play his probably last world cup. Suarez had an embarrasing performance in the last world cup celebrated in Brazil where he bit Giorgio Chiellini´s shoulder in a bizarre game where he got suspended for the rest of the World cup; Suarez had already bitten Ivanovic´s arm in 2013. Suarez´s arrives to Russia having already won every possible club level Cup, but without having won anything with his National team; he is not very popular among the people due to his aggressive and sometimes even reckless style but, we know he will bring out the garra Charrua and will carry his team on his shoulders if its necessary.
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/http://stadium-azteca.underdog.gs/soccerly/2018/03/24/1521943063.jpg
[Source]()
###
Part 2 of 2 coming soon.

body:
![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)
Kazhdyye chetyre goda yest' gruppa igrokov, chto ne yavlyayetsya isklyucheniyem. Kubok mira - luchsheye mesto, chtoby pokazat' igrokam vozmozhnost' poluchit' luchshiy kontrakt s ikh nyneshney komandoy, privlech' vnimaniye Headhunter ili prosto povysit' svoi tseny na rynke, no eto sobytiye, bezuslovno, luchshiy shans dlya igrokov vydelit'sya. sredi tolpy.

<center>![1. Mohamed Salah.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZMgpwTEqWtWcA3piSggYAH2mLYRarMchenhiqopSN5yq/1.%20Mohamed%20Salah.jpg)</center>
# <center>1. Mohamed Salah</center>


Odno delo byt' luchshim igrokom v natsional'noy lige, gde v techeniye etogo goda budet boleye 30 matchey, chtoby poluchit' khoroshuyu formu, nayti luchshiy uroven', ponyat' svoikh tovarishchey po komande i polnost'yu ponyat' igrovoy protsess komandy. Drugoye delo, chto na samom dele eto deystvitel'no tak, chtoby igrat' v turnire, gde u vas yest' tol'ko 3 igry, chtoby sdelat' vse vozmozhnoye, finjo-mojio i dat' vam vse, chtoby dobrat'sya do sleduyushchego raunda, gde plokhoy den' mozhet oznachat', chto vam nuzhno vernut'sya domoy i pereyti na stadiyu nokauta.

<center>![2.Lionel Messi.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbTxKvUHrQTgNJE3tC4jE14mBjDZsvdKvMfEAQEhMaFJC/2.Lionel%20Messi.jpg)</center>
# <center>2.Lionel Messi</center>

Na chempionatakh mira igroki stalkivayutsya s samym zhestkim ispytaniyem svoyey zhizni, gde izuchayutsya vse ikh talanty i navyki, no to, chto otdelyayet khoroshikh igrokov ot velikikh igrokov, - eto mentalitet i otnosheniye k igre v opredelennom napravlenii. situatsiya, v kotoroy oni stalkivayutsya s negativnymi tsennostyami ... V mire chashi razuma eto tak zhe vazhno, kak i telo, poetomu my reshili privesti spisok igrokov, kotoryye, kak my schitayem, imeyut tela i umy, kotoryye pozvolyat im vesti ikh. komanda k pobede. Ko-komandy polagayutsya na nikh, proizvoditel'nost' komandy sil'no zavisit ot proizvoditel'nosti etogo igroka.


<center>![3.Harry Kane.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbqgvp6UHjbPdXmxCRcaogFarS3qsrJng5Rz2CpVmJsiS/3.Harry%20Kane.jpg)</center>
# <center>3.Harry Kane</center>

![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)
Кожні чотири роки є група гравців, які не виняток. Кубок світу є найкращим місцем, щоб показати свою майстерність гравця, щоб отримати кращий контракт з їх поточної командою, щоб привернути увагу до HeadHunter або просто підняти ціни на ринку, але це подія, безумовно, кращий шанс для гравців, щоб виділитися. серед натовпу.
Одна річ, щоб бути кращим гравцем в національній лізі, в якій налічується понад 30 ігор в рік, щоб отримати хорошу форму, знайти кращий рівень, розуміння ваших товаришів по команді і повністю зрозуміти команду геймплей. Це ще одна річ, яка повністю відрізняється від грати в турнірі, де у вас є тільки 3 гри, щоб зробити їх краще, finjo Mojo вас і викластися бій, щоб досягти наступного раунду, де поганий день може означати того, щоб повернутися додому, замість вийшов на сцену нокауту.

У Кубку світу, гравці стикаються з жорстким випробуванням в їхньому житті, де всі свої таланти і навички випробуваного, але те, що відрізняє хороших гравців від великих гравців менталітет і ставлення до гри, в певному напрямку. ситуацій, коли вони стикаються з негативними цінностями ... У світі чаші розуму так само важливо, як і тіло, тому ми вирішили навести список гравців, які, на нашу думку, мають тіло і розум, які дозволять їм керувати ними. команда до перемоги. Покладіться на своїх товаришів по команді, виконання команди дуже залежить від продуктивності гравця.

author: anak123
body:
<center>![piala dunia.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVFjQ7hnd4mpn4k4nL9P5H5aJxvLYvF9quAvyVJUmmkxU/piala%20dunia.jpg)</center>
<center>[](https://pialadunia.tempo.co/read/1051773/kisah-piala-dunia-pertama-1930-sejarah-bermula-di-montevideo)</center>
The 32 best teams in the world will compete for the best in the 2018 World Cup, to be held in Russia from 14 June to 15 July. It will be the 21st edition of the world's biggest football competition.World Cup history has stretched long, since 1930. At that time football has been contested at the Olympics since 1920 and won by Belgium. Uruguay then won the next two editions, namely in 1924 and 1928.
The success of the Olympic football tournament spurred the hope of world football's governing body (FlFA) to be able to hold its own world championship. The questionnaire is then sent to the members association, asking if they agree to organize the tournament.A special committee was formed for election purposes. FIFA President Jules Rimet became the driving force. He is assisted by the tireless secretary general, Henri Delaunay.The FIFA Congress in Amsterdam on May 28, 1928 finally decided to organize a world championship organized by FIFA. Hungary, Italy, Netherlands, Spain and Sweden volunteered to host.
Uruguay finally elected. The country is considered eligible to host the Olympic champion twice and is currently celebrating the 100th anniversary of independence. Uruguay is also willing to bear all costs, including travel and accommodation from participating teams.The first World Cup was full of thorns and thorns. Europe is in the midst of an economic crisis. Participating countries only involve long sea travel, many clubs also object to releasing their best players for two months.
As a result, many countries decide to cancel. Rimet also has to do a lot of maneuvers to make sure there are at least four European teams - France, Belgium, Romania, and Yugoslavia - still performing.Thirteen teams (seven from South America, four from Europe, and two from North America) participated in the tournament. The first World Cup opened at the new Estadio Centenario in Montevideo on July 18, 1930. The tournament was held in three cities.
The participating teams were then divided into four groups, with the winners from each group progressing to the semi-finals. The first two World Cup matches took place simultaneously, and were won by France and the United States, which beat Mexico 4-1 and Belgium 3-0.France's Lucien Laurent scored the first goal in World Cup history. While American goalkeeper Jimmy Douglas recorded the first clean sheet (not conceded) in the tournament.
Argentina, Uruguay, the United States and Yugoslavia won their respective groups and managed to qualify for the semi-finals. In the final, Uruguay meet Argentina. The favored Uruguayan host at the start finally won with a 4-2 win. The last match in Centenario, Montevideo, witnessed 93 thousand.
The first World Cup was a success, but Uruguay were disappointed as there were only four European teams participating. Anger in Montevideo was so great that four years later, when Italy hosted, Uruguay became the first and only defending champion to refuse to defend the title.In 1930 World Cup Guillermo Stabile from Argentina was the top scorer, with a collection of 8 goals. In 18 games it created a total of 70 goals. While the total audience reached 590 thousand or an average of 32 thousand per game.

body:
####
Already more 1,200 entries from 1,200 different Steemians and you still have one week to submit your entry!
#####
This is probably the contest with the highest number of participants in the history of Steemit... how awesome is that?
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png
The previous announcement post already paid out and it can´t be resteemed anymore. Since we want EVERYONE on Steemit to join this contest and one of the rules for joining the @blocktrades Cup is resteeming the announcement post, we decided to make a new announcement.
###
IF YOU WANT TO JOIN THIS CONTEST, YOU DON´T HAVE TO RESTEEM THE PREVIOUS POST, YOU CAN RESTEEM THIS ONE.
@blocktrades loves to sponsor this type of community engaging projects and @anomadsoul & @acidyo know a lot of Steemians love this game, so we decided to organize this enormous Football World Cup event.
You don´t have to be a professional analyst of the game, your national team doesn´t have to participate, you don´t need to know much about Football to join... All you need to do is write a post picking every match winner and, the Steemian who makes the most points, wins. ##
As simple as that
###
Hey @anomadsoul, I want a piece of those 2,000 SBD, how do I join?
It´s very easy: In the world cup there are two stages, The Group Stage and The Knockout Stage. For the Group Stage of this @blocktrades cup, all you have to do is make a post with your match predictions in each of the following matches. The team names must be in english: ####

You have to make a post with your predictions. On this post you must use W (for win), L (for lose) and T (for tie) in each game. ##
YOU MUST USE THIS TEMPLATE TO JOIN THE CONTEST. [CLICK HERE TO GET THE TEMPLATE](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@mexico-trail/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections)
Hey @anomadsoul, are there any rules?
Yes, there are a few simple rules:
###
RULES
1 - The title of your post must be: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections 2 -In your post, you have to include a link to this announcement. 3 - Use the format included in the link above so we can organize each entry. 4 - Use the tags blocktradesworldcup and the tag mypicks 5 - Resteem this post. We want to have hundreds of entries. 6 - Once you make the post, you can´t edit it. So please think your picks thoroughly before posting. 7 - Minimum Reputation to participate is 40. This is to avoid bots from joining.} 8 - You can submit your entry until June 14th 2018 at 00:01 am, UTC Time zone. ####
Scoring: For each correct pick you make on the Group Stage, you will be awarded one (1) point. At the end of the cup, the prize pool will de divided among the top scorer Steemians. The number of steemians rewarded will depend on the number of entries we get.
Hey @blocktrades, what about the second stage of the Cup, the knockout stage? The Group Stage finishes on June 28th (Russian time) and the Knockout stage starts on June 30th. So we will be making an announcement with this account afterJune 28 to let you know how the Knockout stage works.
Everyone can join both stages and the winners will be decided by the scoring sum of both Stages.
Good luck everyone and let the predictions begin!
####
You can submit your entry until June 14th 2018 at 00:01 am, UTC Time zone.

author: rosmi
body:
Postingan ini adalah terjemahan bebas dari postingan @worldcup-russia

https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/you-still-have-time-join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-and-win-2-000-sbd-in-prizes

Sudah lebih 1.200 entri dari 1.200 orang Steemian yang berbeda dan Anda masih memiliki satu minggu untuk mengirimkan entri Anda!

Ini mungkin kontes dengan jumlah peserta terbanyak dalam sejarah Steemit ... betapa hebatnya itu?

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/k6eybmuhi4.jpg)

Posting pengumuman sebelumnya sudah dibayarkan dan tidak dapat ditebus lagi. Karena kami ingin SEMUA ORANG di Steemit untuk bergabung dalam kontes ini dan salah satu aturan untuk bergabung dengan @blocktrades Cup adalah me-resteem pengumuman, kami memutuskan untuk membuat pengumuman baru.

JIKA ANDA INGIN BERGABUNG DALAM KONTES INI, ANDA TIDAK HARUS ME-RESTEEM POSTING SEBELUMNYA, ANDA BISA ME-RESTEEM POSTINGAN SATU INI.

@blocktrades suka mensponsori proyek keterlibatan komunitas jenis ini dan @anomadsoul & @acidyo tahu banyak Steemian menyukai game ini, jadi kami memutuskan untuk menyelenggarakan acara Piala Dunia Sepakbola yang sangat besar ini.

Anda tidak perlu menjadi seorang analis profesional dari permainan, tim nasional Anda tidak harus berpartisipasi, Anda tidak perlu tahu banyak tentang Sepakbola untuk bergabung ...

Yang perlu Anda lakukan adalah menulis posting memilih setiap pemenang pertandingan dan, Steemian yang membuat poin terbanyak, menang.

           Sangat Simpel

Hai @anomadsoul, saya ingin bagian dari 2.000 SBD itu, bagaimana saya bergabung?

Sangat mudah: Di piala dunia ada dua tahap, Penyisihan Group dan Selanjutnya sistem gugur.

Untuk Panggung Grup piala @blocktrades ini, yang harus Anda lakukan adalah membuat pos dengan prediksi pertandingan Anda di setiap pertandingan berikut. Nama-nama tim harus dalam bahasa Inggris:

Anda harus membuat posting dengan prediksi Anda. Pada posting ini Anda harus menggunakan W (untuk menang), L (untuk kalah) dan T (untuk dasi) di setiap gim.

ANDA HARUS MENGGUNAKAN CONTOH INI UNTUK BERGABUNG DENGAN KONTES. https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@mexico-trail/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections

Hei @anomadsoul, apakah ada aturan?
Ya, ada beberapa aturan sederhana:

ATURAN

1 - Judul posting Anda harus: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections

2 -Dalam posting Anda, Anda harus menyertakan tautan ke pengumuman ini.

3 - Gunakan format yang disertakan dalam tautan di atas sehingga kami dapat mengatur setiap entri.

4 - Gunakan tag blocktradesworldcup dan tag mypicks

5 - Resteem posting ini. Kami ingin memiliki ratusan entri.

6 - Setelah Anda membuat posting, Anda tidak dapat mengeditnya. Jadi silakan pikirkan pilihan Anda dengan seksama sebelum memposting.

7 - Reputasi Minimum untuk berpartisipasi adalah 40. Ini untuk menghindari bot bergabung.

8 - Anda dapat mengirimkan entri Anda hingga 14 Juni 2018 pukul 00:01, zona waktu UTC.

Mencetak: Untuk setiap tebakan yang benar yang Anda lakukan babak penyisihan Grup, Anda akan diberikan satu (1) poin. Di akhir kejuaraan, hadiah akan dibagi di antara Steemians penebak atas. Jumlah steemian yang dihargai akan bergantung pada jumlah entri yang kami dapatkan.

Hai @blocktrades, bagaimana dengan tahap kedua Piala, babak sistem gugur ?

Tahap Penyisihan group selesai pada 28 Juni (waktu Rusia) dan tahap Sistem gugur dimulai pada 30 Juni. Jadi kami akan membuat pengumuman dengan akun ini setelahJuni 28 untuk memberi tahu Anda bagaimana tahapan Sistem gugur bekerja.

Setiap orang dapat bergabung dalam kedua tahap dan pemenang akan ditentukan oleh jumlah skor dari kedua Tahapan.

Selamat mencoba semuanya dan biarkan prediksi dimulai!

Anda dapat mengirimkan entri Anda hingga 14 Juni 2018 pukul 00:01, zona waktu UTC.

Ini adalah kontes yang disponsori @blocktrades, jika Anda menyukai apa yang ia lakukan, pilih @blocktrades sebagai saksi https://steemit.com/~witnesses

Ini adalah kontes terorganisir @acidyo & @anomadsoul, jika Anda menyukai apa yang kami lakukan, pilih @ocd-saksi sebagai saksi https://steemit.com/~witnesses

author: saifulanwar
body:
Есть более 1200 записей от 1200 различных людей из Стемиана, и у вас есть еще одна неделя, чтобы представить свои записи!
-----------------------------------------------

Это может быть конкурс с большим количеством участников истории Стемита ... насколько это здорово?
-------------------------------------------------
![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)

Предыдущее сообщение было оплачено и больше не может быть выкуплено. Потому что мы хотим, чтобы EVERYONE в Steemit присоединился к этому конкурсу, и одно из правил присоединиться к кубку @blocktrades - выкупить объявление, мы решили сделать новое объявление.
ЕСЛИ ВЫ ХОТИТЕ ПРИСОЕДИНЯТЬСЯ НА ЭТОТ КОНКУРС, ВЫ НЕ ДОЛЖНЫ ПРИНИМАТЬ ПРЕДЫДУЩИЙ ПОЧТА, ВЫ МОЖЕТЕ ПРОИЗВОДИТЬ ЭТО ОДИН.

@blocktrades любит спонсировать проекты взаимодействия с сообществом этого типа, и @anomadsoul & @acidyo знают, что многие из Steemian любят эту игру, поэтому мы решили провести этот грандиозный турнир по футболу.

Вам не обязательно быть профессиональным аналитиком игры, ваша сборная не должна участвовать, вам не нужно много знать о футболе, чтобы присоединиться ...

Все, что вам нужно сделать, это написать сообщение, набирающее каждого победителя матча, и Стемеан, который делает больше очков, выигрывает.

Так просто, как
Привет @anomadsoul, я хочу часть 2000 SBD, как я могу присоединиться?
Это легко: в мировом кубке есть два этапа: Stage Stage и Stage Knockout.

Для этого этапа группового этапа кубка @blocktrades все, что вам нужно сделать, это создать сообщение с предсказаниями матча в каждой из следующих игр. Имена команд должны быть на английском языке:
Вы должны сделать сообщение с вашим прогнозом. В этом посте вы должны использовать W (чтобы выиграть), L (проиграть) и T (для привязки) в каждой игре.

ВЫ ДОЛЖНЫ ИСПОЛЬЗОВАТЬ ЭТОТ ШАБЛОН, ЧТОБЫ ПРИСОЕДИНЯТЬСЯ К КОНКУРУ. ЩЕЛКНИТЕ ЗДЕСЬ, ЧТОБЫ ПОЛУЧИТЬ ШАБЛОН
Эй, @anomadsoul, есть правило?

Да, есть несколько простых правил:
ПРАВИЛА
1 - Название вашего сообщения должно быть: The @blocktrades World Cup | Мой выбор

2 - В вашем сообщении вы должны указать ссылку на это объявление.

3 - Используйте формат, указанный в ссылке выше, чтобы мы могли организовать каждую запись.

4- Используйте теги blocktradesworldcup и теги mypicks

5 - Восстановить сообщение. Мы хотим иметь сотни записей.

6 - После создания сообщения вы не можете его редактировать. Поэтому, пожалуйста, подумайте о своем выборе тщательно перед публикацией.

7 - Минимальная репутация для участия - 40. Это делается для того, чтобы не присоединяться к ботам.}

8 - Вы можете подать заявку до 14 июня 2018 года в 00:01, часовой пояс UTC.

Печать: для каждого правильного пикапа, который вы делаете на групповом этапе, вам будет присвоен один (1) балл. В конце кубка приз будет разделен между главными голами состязателей. Предполагаемое количество участников войны будет зависеть от количества записей, которые мы получаем.
Привет @blocktrades, а как насчет второго этапа Кубка, нокаутом?

Групповой этап завершился 28 июня (русское время) и этап нокаута начинается 30 июня. Поэтому после 28 июня мы объявим об этом аккаунте, чтобы вы знали, как работает этап нокаута.

Каждый человек может участвовать в обоих этапах, и победитель будет определяться количеством баллов с обеих этапов.
Попробуйте и пусть начнутся предсказания!

Это конкурс спонсоров на @blocktrades, если вам нравится, что он делает, проголосуйте за @blocktrades в качестве свидетеля [здесь](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

Это конкурс @acidyo & @anomadsoul, проголосовавший за @ ocd-witness в качестве свидетеля [здесь](https://steemit.com/wwitnesses)

author: wr212
body:
![b4.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcM9bBkWqXcWxXnKHhUr6kzcnQwhN7U58TtNb5ByRUf6A/b4.png)

The World Cup is the largest international football event in the world. The tournament is held every four years and is hosted by FIFA as the world's tallest footballing body. The FIFA World Cup has the official name of the FIFA World Cup. Each country participates through the qualification stage to the final to win the world championship trophy. But this tournament has a long history of becoming the most popular sporting event, even outside the Olympics. Here is the info on World Cup History or World Cup history from start to now from 1930 to today.

![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)

# World Cup history

Long before the first World Cup was held in 1930, the first international football match was held in 1872. At that time England met with Scotland. Football also became popular around the world when entering the year 1900. Many national teams from countries other than England began to take shape. FIFA was then formed on May 22, 1904 as an international football authority.
The popularity of football makes this sport start on the Olympic agenda. Yes, football became one of the official sports in the biggest sports event, the Olympics. Although FIFA has planned to make an international tournament outside the Olympics, but it can not be realized.
In 1914, FIFA also agreed to organize a football tournament at the Olympics. Starting the 1920 Olympics, soccer sport became an unofficial international soccer tournament. Belgium became the champion in 1920, while Uruguay won the Olympic gold medal in 1924 and 1928.
FIFA then decided to organize a soccer tournament of its own. This is related to the decision of the IOC, the Olympic organizer to eliminate the sport of football at the 1932 Olympics in the United States, due to the low popularity of football in America. FIFA president at the time, Jules Rimet immediately set up a new competition system given the FIFA World Cup or FIFA World Cup.

<center>![s1.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQYmhsTkYbCgvtk7yATQi8qKxpZjk3LNxrHjXxy9NKqAX/s1.jpg)</center>
# World Cup First
Uruguay was named host of the first World Cup tournament in 1930, as an unofficial world champion to win two golds in the last two Olympics. Despite the problems, mainly because of transport by some European countries did not participate, but eventually the first World Cup event was held. Uruguay came out as champions by beating Argentina in the final round. The 1930 World Cup was followed by 13 contestant teams.
Furthermore, FIFA holds this tournament every four years. Each FIFA member country team, now numbering more than 200 countries, can participate through the qualifying round. To date, the World Cup has become one of the most popular international football tournaments. Leading countries such as Brazil, Italy, Germany, Argentina or Uruguay have become world champions more than once.
World Cup Winner List
Who are the countries that have won the World Cup from before until now? Here is a list of World Cup champions from year to year starting from the 1930 World Cup to the 2018 World Cup which is currently the latest full update.

> >  1930: Uruguay
1934: Italy
 1938: Italy
 1950: Uruguay
1954: West Germany
1958: Brazil
 1962: Brazil
 1966: England
1970: Brazil
 1974: West Germany
 1978: Argentina
1982: Italy
1986: Argentina
1990: West Germany
1994: Brazil
1998: France
 2002: Brazil
 2006: Italy
 2010: Spain
 2014: Germany
 2018:?


Well that's the info about the history of the World Cup from the first until now. The start of the World Cup took place in 1930 where Uruguay came out as champions. Meanwhile, until now the Brazilian national team into a World Cup winning team with a total of 5 titles. To ensure the World Cup remains the most popular and most prestigious soccer event in the world.

body:
<center> **Sudah lebih 1.200 entri dari 1.200 orang Steemian yang berbeda dan Anda masih memiliki satu minggu untuk mengirimkan entri Anda!
<hr>
Ini mungkin kontes dengan jumlah peserta terbanyak dalam sejarah Steemit ... betapa hebatnya itu?**</center>
![](https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png)

Posting pengumuman sebelumnya sudah dibayarkan dan tidak dapat ditebus lagi. Karena kami ingin SEMUA ORANG di Steemit untuk bergabung dalam kontes ini dan salah satu aturan untuk bergabung dengan @blocktrades Cup adalah menebus pengumuman, kami memutuskan untuk membuat pengumuman baru.
<hr>
<center>**JIKA ANDA INGIN BERGABUNG DALAM KONTES INI, ANDA TIDAK HARUS MEMBAWA POSTING SEBELUMNYA, ANDA BISA MENGHASILKAN SATU INI.**</center>
<hr>

@blocktrades suka mensponsori proyek keterlibatan komunitas jenis ini dan @anomadsoul & @acidyo tahu banyak Steemian menyukai game ini, jadi kami memutuskan untuk menyelenggarakan acara Piala Dunia Sepakbola yang sangat besar ini.

Anda tidak perlu menjadi seorang analis profesional dari permainan, tim nasional Anda tidak harus berpartisipasi, Anda tidak perlu tahu banyak tentang Football untuk bergabung ...

Yang perlu Anda lakukan adalah menulis posting memilih setiap pemenang pertandingan dan, Steemian yang membuat poin terbanyak, menang.
<hr>
<center>**Sesimpel itu**
<hr>
**Hai @anomadsoul, saya ingin bagian dari 2.000 SBD itu, bagaimana saya bergabung?**</center>
<hr>
Sangat mudah: Di piala dunia ada dua tahap, The **Group Stage**(babak penyisihan) dan The **Knockout Stage** (babak 16 )

Untuk **Grup Stage** (babak penyisihan) piala @blocktrades ini, yang harus Anda lakukan adalah membuat pos dengan prediksi pertandingan Anda di setiap pertandingan berikut. Nama-nama tim harus dalam bahasa Inggris:

<hr>
<hr>

Anda harus membuat posting dengan prediksi Anda. Pada posting ini Anda harus menggunakan W (untuk menang), L (untuk kalah) dan T (untuk dasi) di setiap pertandingan.

ANDA HARUS MENGGUNAKAN TEMPLATE INI UNTUK BERGABUNG DENGAN KONTES. [KLIK DI SINI UNTUK MENDAPATKAN TEMPLATE](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@mexico-trail/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections).

<hr>

<center>Hei @anomadsoul, apakah ada aturan?</center>

<center>Ya, ada beberapa aturan sederhana:
ATURAN</center>

<hr>

1 - Judul posting Anda harus: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections

2 -Dalam posting Anda, Anda harus menyertakan tautan ke pengumuman ini.

3 - Gunakan format yang disertakan dalam tautan di atas sehingga kami dapat mengatur setiap entri.

4 - Gunakan tag blocktradesworldcup dan tag mypicks

5 - Pulihkan posting ini. Kami ingin memiliki ratusan entri.

6 - Setelah Anda membuat posting, Anda tidak dapat mengeditnya. Jadi silakan pikirkan pilihan Anda dengan seksama sebelum memposting.

7 - Reputasi Minimum untuk berpartisipasi adalah 40. Ini untuk menghindari bot bergabung.}

8 - Anda dapat mengirimkan entri Anda hingga 14 Juni 2018 pukul 00:01, zona waktu UTC.

**Nilai Skor: Untuk setiap pengambilan yang benar yang Anda lakukan di Stage Grup (babak penyisihan) Anda akan diberikan satu (1) poin. Di akhir pertandingan, hadiah akan dibagi di antara pencetak gol skor Steemians teratas. Jumlah steemian yang dihargai akan bergantung pada jumlah entri yang kami dapatkan.**

<hr>

Hai @blocktrades, bagaimana dengan tahap kedua Piala, babak sistem gugur?

Tahap Kelompok selesai pada 28 Juni (waktu Rusia) dan tahap Knockout dimulai pada 30 Juni. Jadi kami akan membuat pengumuman dengan akun ini setelahJuni 28 untuk memberi tahu Anda bagaimana tahapan Knockout bekerja.

<center>Setiap orang dapat bergabung dalam kedua tahap dan pemenang akan ditentukan oleh jumlah skor dari kedua Tahapan.</center>
<center>Selamat mencoba semuanya dan biarkan prediksi dimulai!</center>

author: rivalzzz
body:
![BlobannerWC](https://i.imgur.com/jqmA46S.jpg)

Hey Steemians,

die WM startet in kürze und um eure Blog-Profile etwas thematisch aufzufrischen habe ich euch heute ein paar Blogbanner erstellt, die ihr gerne in eure Profile einbinden dürft.

Die Grafiken sind alle Lizenzfrei von Pixabay und dürfen auch für kommerzielle Zwecke genutzt werden. Einfach die imgur URL in euer Profil eintragen.

![](https://i.imgur.com/pBnHgOG.png)

Hey, Steemians,

the World Cup will start soon and to refresh your blog profiles I have created some blog banners for you today, which you are welcome to include in your profiles.

The graphics are all royalty-free from Pixabay and may also be used for commercial purposes. Simply enter the imgur URL in your profile.

----------
### Banner - WM Deutschland / German-Russia
![bild-1](https://i.imgur.com/EQqMBui.jpg)

    https://i.imgur.com/EQqMBui.jpg
+ Licenselink: [Backgroundimage](https://pixabay.com/en/football-bundesliga-ball-stadium-1439082/)
+ Licenselink: [Russia2018](https://pixabay.com/en/football-sport-leather-ball-sports-3344911/)
+ Licenselink: [germanflag](https://pixabay.com/en/germany-flag-home-country-1455116/)


### WM Banner Deutschland-Russia2018 / German-Russia
![bild-2](https://i.imgur.com/HjzseSR.jpg)

    https://i.imgur.com/HjzseSR.jpg


### WM Banner 3 - Official Football
![bild-3](https://i.imgur.com/VM56tm7.jpg)

    https://i.imgur.com/VM56tm7.jpg
+ Licenselink: [Backgroundimage](https://pixabay.com/en/world-cup-2018-russia-football-3409220/)

### WM Banner mit Russia 2018 - Official Football with Russia 2018
![bild-4](https://i.imgur.com/MDlNruN.jpg)

    https://i.imgur.com/MDlNruN.jpg
+ Licenselink: [Backgroundimage](https://pixabay.com/en/world-cup-2018-russia-football-3409220/)

### WM Banner Stadion mit Deutschlandflagge / Stadium with German flag
![bild-4](https://i.imgur.com/g30qbeu.jpg)

    https://i.imgur.com/g30qbeu.jpg
+ Licenselink: [Backgroundimage](https://pixabay.com/en/audience-bleachers-crowd-game-1866738/)

### WM Banner Feldecke / FieldCorner
![bild-4](https://i.imgur.com/DGxu6kY.jpg)

    https://i.imgur.com/DGxu6kY.jpg
+ Licenselink: [Backgroundimage](https://pixabay.com/en/soccer-playing-field-stadium-1859046/)

### WM Banner Feld mit Russia 2018 / Fieldcorner with Russia 2018
![bild-4](https://i.imgur.com/ZXyCxBL.jpg)

    https://i.imgur.com/ZXyCxBL.jpg
+ Licenselink: [Backgroundimage](https://pixabay.com/en/soccer-playing-field-stadium-1859046/)

![](https://i.imgur.com/pBnHgOG.png)


ich hoffe euch gefallen die Banner. Ihr könnt gerne den Post resteemen, sodass jeder auch die Möglichkeit hat, sich ein WM-Banner ins Profil zu bauen und nicht im Abseits zu stehen.
<hr>
I hope you like the banners. You are welcome to resteem the post so that everyone has the possibility to build a world championship banner in his profile and not to stand on the sidelines. ;-)

### WM Tipping

Die WM ist mit vielen Tippspielen auf Steemit auch hier bereits ein großes Thema.
[@blocktrades hat zum Beispiel ein 2,000 SBD Tippspiel veröffentlicht](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes). Jeder darf daran teilnehmen und je mehr dort mitmachen, desto interessanter wirds auch wenn die Vorrunden abgeschlossen sind :)

**Das große D-A-CH WM Tippspiel**

Im deutschen Bereich wurde vom @dach-support [ebenfalls ein Tippspiel organisiert mit einem stolzen Preispool von 100 SBD](https://steemit.com/dach-tippsiel/@dach-support/das-grosse-d-a-ch-wm-tippspiel) plus einen weiteren Pool für Steemians, die nebenbei eine weitere Wette abgeben wollen.

![](https://i.imgur.com/pBnHgOG.png)



The World Cup is already a big topic here with many betting games on Steemit.

**More than 1,400 different Steemians taking Part in this Contest!**
[Here you can see, that you can still Enter the Contest!](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/you-still-have-time-join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-and-win-2-000-sbd-in-prizes)

[@blocktrades, for example, has published a 2,000 SBD betting game](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes). Everyone is allowed to participate and the more they participate, the more interesting it becomes even when the preliminary rounds are finished :)
Well organised by @acidyo and @anomadsoul this TippingGame is, how i will say it... AMAZING and a big Chance for all Steemians!


Have fun and enjoy the Graphics! 
Yours @RivalzZz

author: phillips93
body:
![ekaterimburgo.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdX2xpTp4iTZmuiadJVgAdL9CJidNRBP2oVfJfYcpJTMM/ekaterimburgo.jpg)

In the construction of the stands were used abundant architectural and decorative elements of the Soviet neoclassicism, along with decorative arts in the form of sculptures, vases and shields. In the East and West tribunes, 30% of locations were placed under a canopy or canopy.

History
This stadium, built in 1953, is home to one of the oldest soccer clubs in the country, FC Ural. Since its inauguration it has been renewed on numerous occasions. The last of these reforms was carried out for Russia 2018. On each occasion, however, its historic façade has remained unaltered, thus respecting its status as an architectural legacy. In the construction of the stands were used abundant architectural and decorative elements of the Soviet neoclassicism, along with decorative arts in the form of sculptures, vases and shields.  


![ekaterimburgo1.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPyJ8BnF3r33mT7jnDs5G7TdcU3wkRGv2oFZeNKo7EZvJ/ekaterimburgo1.jpg)

Design
The stadium retains its historic facade, but received a new roof and temporary stands in time for the 2018 Russian celebration.  

Official name: Stadium of the 2018 FIFA World Cup in Yekaterinburg
Headquarters: Yekaterinburg
Project: Reconstruction of the stadium
Total capacity: 35,000 spectators
Location: Repin Street.    


![ekaterimburgo2.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbP2eSaY8hzkmF8fo7fcQv6XN4SvJcPBanGMynAjx4fVs/ekaterimburgo2.jpg)





















































































































Source: https://es.fifa.com/worldcup/destination/stadiums/stadium=5031304/index.html   

https://www.eluniverso.com/deportes/2018/06/09/nota/6800273/mundial-rusia-2018-raro-diseno-ekaterimburgo-arena

author: saifulanwar
body:
![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)
Lionel Messi mentions there are eight players who he believes will shine in the 2018 World Cup. From the list there is no name rival in the Spanish League, Cristiano Ronaldo.

Messi will pursue his first World Cup title with Argentina in the tournament in Russia later. At the age of 30, this opportunity is mentioned as the last one for the Barcelona player.

![b4.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcM9bBkWqXcWxXnKHhUr6kzcnQwhN7U58TtNb5ByRUf6A/b4.png)

Messi assess the competition in the final round will be tight. He also saw a number of players will appear more prominent than the others.

He mentioned a number of names that are considered to be shining. "Brazil has Ney (Neymar) and Philippe (Coutinho)," he told El Mundo Deportivo.

He added: "Spain has Andres Iniesta and (David) Silva. Germany does not have stars, but they are very solid."

<center>![messi.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXYjheZhQim3gqjopvopeYUoUc9bdrVBQaMy9ZYD9U8Ua/messi.jpg)</center>

The other star he sees is the Belgian team. "Belgium has (Eden) Hazard and (Kevin) De Bruyne, France owns (Antoine) Griezmann and (Kylian) Mbappe," he said. "This tournament is full of very good players."

Whether intentionally or forgetfully, Messi did not mention Ronaldo, a Portuguese player who has always been his main rival in the hunt for the world's best player title.

In the final round later, Messi and Ronaldo are in a different group. Messi and Argentina will play in Group D alongside Iceland, Croatia and Nigeria. While Ronaldo and Portugal will play in group B along with Spain, Morocco, also Iran.

![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)

Mohamed Salah performed with other Egyptian national team players at the final training session in Cairo on Friday, June 9, 2018. A day later he flew to Russia to prepare for the 2018 World Cup.
The 25-year-old has not played since suffering a right shoulder injury in last Champions League defeat by Real Madrid last month. He doubted he would be able to play in the opening in Group A when Egypt against Uruguay on Friday.

<center>![14.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmNqbJssdDEazhAMUbfAJywDEcRtwaXN7PSbWoywmyWYaJ/14.jpg)</center>

Salah, who scored 44 goals for Liverpool this season, spent about 45 minutes walking around Cairo's national stadium in front of about 2,000 supporters. However, he does not train with other squad members.
One posed for the narcissist and grinned with the Egyptian national team mascot, the green "crocodile crocodile," and then depicted on the plane carrying squad manager Hector Cuper to their Grozny headquarters.

author: anak123
body:
<center>![20.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmb6Tb4NB5W8kdsAMWg3Q95dfPoAZbDSdrL6cn31qysuum/20.jpg)</center>
Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo have dominated world football in the past 10 years. Both won the world's best player title five times. Now both are starting to get out of the way - Ronaldo and Messi are 30 years old - 30 years old - although their looks have not shown any signs of sagging.

Who's the second successor? According to the football world governing body (FIFA) report, there are at least five names worth mentioning:

<center>![21.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZkEXMVoCdKv5CuFRihP7vdVWgLYCSfpwjBj7pQCachdg/21.jpg)</center>
<center> Neymar (Brasil)</center>
He is a classy striker who holds the status of the most expensive player in the world. Even so the backbone of Barcelona, now peddling the Paris Saint-Germain front line. Later he is also rumored to be joining Real Madrid, the club Ronaldo.

He is only 26 years old so has the opportunity to enjoy kemashuran as the most prominent players when Messi and Ronaldo began to fade. He has a complete capital: basketball grinder, game reading intelligence, and exceptional final resolution capabilities. He is now a mainstay Brazilian who fought for World Cup champion 2018.


<center>![22.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQRg9NydfqdRvbeTDzwsAWfhumSBmYyyfAc4g4sxWeW8B/22.jpg)</center>
<center>Mohamed Salah (Mesir)</center>
His name did not sound much last season. But, this season, Mohamed Salah darts like a meteor. The 28-year-old has donated 44 goals for Liverpool, bringing the team through to the Champions League next season and reaching the Champions League final this season. In that last game too - when Liverpool beat Real Madrid - he suffered a shoulder injury. Now the winger is still racing to recover in order to strengthen Egypt in the 2018 World Cup.


<center>![23.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYUXKkraWBBiKG1whMmNgvwJKfAxT1fe2TKaXdqsvf6Dc/23.jpg)</center>
<center>Kevin de Bruyne (Belgia)</center>
This season, Kevin de Bruyne won the ass kings title from another Belgian player, Eden Hazard. Donations assist him to lead Manchester City into English Premier League champions. If he can lead Belgium to the 2018 World Cup champions, De Bruyne could be on the shortlist of the world's best players of the year, rivaling Ronaldo and Messi.

<center>![24.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdhQgebwvF6RHkPN8gX9TvtK1MgwJ4MmDhqiwUB2cVHvm/24.jpg)</center>
<center>Harry Kane (Inggris)</center>

Harry Kane is maturing at the age of 24 years. He is a hard worker in the field, has a tremendous instinct in finding space and time to score goals. He is a mainstay of Tottenham and England national team. In the national team he has even been believed to be a captain. After Messi and Ronaldo decline, Kane is likely to become Neymar's top competitor in the title race of the world's best players. Especially if he can move to a club that is more likely champion at the level of domestic and Europe.

<center>![25.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRB8SD7gTTQA9US9av79syvZDLmvjRtJv7mhvz3VngcDL/25.jpg)</center>
<center>Kylian Mbappe (Prancis)</center>

In the age of 19 years, he was able to compete with another big name. At a young age he was able to show his maturity in scoring goals, in Monaco last season and now at PSG. The 2018 World Cup could be the perfect stage for him in displaying his brilliance with France.

author: exqueila
body:
####
Welcome my dear friends of Steemit:
![Mundial.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmeVVMpCSrSs4LTtoBcdfeqZ59bxrqPpoYSfoBQBeFYbZy/Mundial.jpg)
In this opportunity we join all the countries of the world, with an emotion that paralyzes us all as it is the World Cup of Russia 2018, even countries like ours that has never had the luck to participate in this wonderful event, it is also contagious and soccer is lived as if our selection had present, I am also from a city in Venezuela that is soccer excellence, as is the State of Merida, and is more than that my parents are lovers of the sport king, and particularly I start to believe that is a passion that is born or emerges as in genes or genetics, because it is a passion for this sport, and it is not only to see football is to know about football that is another level. ![futbol.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXyyqU1UkSYhPdDT5JN7cTk2bRWDgrEw7dVf2F46uDw79/futbol.jpg) There are only a few days left until the start of the World Cup, and there is always a lot of expectation to know the team that will win the world cup, so I applaud the creator of this brilliant contest, like @blocktrades, and also two great ones like it is @anomadsoul and @acidyo, to follow the steps of this great event, they are very creative because they put us to fly the imagination of each of us who are part of this great family of Steemit, to predict the markers of each of the games and additional to it we will be rewarded, which makes it more attractive. Next I will mention the rules of the contest:
Rules
1 - The title of your post should be: The World Cup @blocktrades | My predictions 2 -In your post, you must include a link to the original announcement in English. This is the post 3 - Use the format included in the link a little above to make the organization easier for us. 4 - Use the blocktradesworldcup tag and the mypicks tag 5 - Da resteem to the original post in English. We want hundreds of tickets. This is the post 6 - Once you publish your post, you can not edit it. So think your predictions very well before publishing your post. 7 - The minimum reputation to participate is 40. This is to prevent bots from participating. 8 - You can participate until June 14, 2018 at 00:01 am, UTC
Now we are going to the most exciting part, as it is predicting who will be the winners, of the games of the first round, it is very simple what you should do is put W (for victory) L (for defeat) or T (for tie in each game. author: anak123
body:
<center>![20.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmb6Tb4NB5W8kdsAMWg3Q95dfPoAZbDSdrL6cn31qysuum/20.jpg)</center>
Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo have dominated world football in the past 10 years. Both won the world's best player title five times. Now both are starting to get out of the way - Ronaldo and Messi are 30 years old - 30 years old - although their looks have not shown any signs of sagging.

Who's the second successor? According to the football world governing body (FIFA) report, there are at least five names worth mentioning:

<center>![21.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmZkEXMVoCdKv5CuFRihP7vdVWgLYCSfpwjBj7pQCachdg/21.jpg)</center>
<center> Neymar (Brasil)</center>
He is a classy striker who holds the status of the most expensive player in the world. Even so the backbone of Barcelona, now peddling the Paris Saint-Germain front line. Later he is also rumored to be joining Real Madrid, the club Ronaldo.

He is only 26 years old so has the opportunity to enjoy kemashuran as the most prominent players when Messi and Ronaldo began to fade. He has a complete capital: basketball grinder, game reading intelligence, and exceptional final resolution capabilities. He is now a mainstay Brazilian who fought for World Cup champion 2018.


<center>![22.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQRg9NydfqdRvbeTDzwsAWfhumSBmYyyfAc4g4sxWeW8B/22.jpg)</center>
<center>Mohamed Salah (Mesir)</center>
His name did not sound much last season. But, this season, Mohamed Salah darts like a meteor. The 28-year-old has donated 44 goals for Liverpool, bringing the team through to the Champions League next season and reaching the Champions League final this season. In that last game too - when Liverpool beat Real Madrid - he suffered a shoulder injury. Now the winger is still racing to recover in order to strengthen Egypt in the 2018 World Cup.


<center>![23.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYUXKkraWBBiKG1whMmNgvwJKfAxT1fe2TKaXdqsvf6Dc/23.jpg)</center>
<center>Kevin de Bruyne (Belgia)</center>
This season, Kevin de Bruyne won the ass kings title from another Belgian player, Eden Hazard. Donations assist him to lead Manchester City into English Premier League champions. If he can lead Belgium to the 2018 World Cup champions, De Bruyne could be on the shortlist of the world's best players of the year, rivaling Ronaldo and Messi.

<center>![24.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdhQgebwvF6RHkPN8gX9TvtK1MgwJ4MmDhqiwUB2cVHvm/24.jpg)</center>
<center>Harry Kane (Inggris)</center>

Harry Kane is maturing at the age of 24 years. He is a hard worker in the field, has a tremendous instinct in finding space and time to score goals. He is a mainstay of Tottenham and England national team. In the national team he has even been believed to be a captain. After Messi and Ronaldo decline, Kane is likely to become Neymar's top competitor in the title race of the world's best players. Especially if he can move to a club that is more likely champion at the level of domestic and Europe.

<center>![25.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRB8SD7gTTQA9US9av79syvZDLmvjRtJv7mhvz3VngcDL/25.jpg)</center>
<center>Kylian Mbappe (Prancis)</center>

In the age of 19 years, he was able to compete with another big name. At a young age he was able to show his maturity in scoring goals, in Monaco last season and now at PSG. The 2018 World Cup could be the perfect stage for him in displaying his brilliance with France.

author: saiful46
body:
<center>![11.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmVMaArNgW19Xy4MDwXJRwvKE3pVqBtyDPf2PRGrcseF26)
</center>
Nielsen Sports conducted a survey in 30 countries to pray for the insanity of its citizens in football. The result is surprising.
Brazil, known as the craziest football in the country, According to
The survey was only in position 13 and only 60% of those interviewed said they were interested in this sport.
<center>![10.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmbjPEfB969EWMnHJ8Nws15weHMWHZfa48og9nTh9QFt4R)
</center>

United Arab Emirates tops the Nielsen Sports survey with 80%, followed by Thailand (78%) and Chile, Portugal and Turkey (75%).
Brazil's figures have dropped from 72% in 2013, the year before hosting the World Cup where the national team was humiliated 7-1 in the semi-finals by Germany.
The Brazilians can be very fluid about football and the presence in the game in the country fluctuates wildly, depending on the form of the team involved, whether they are at a decisive stage in the competition, the kickoff time of the match and even the weather. The World Cup in Brazil last season had an average attendance of 16,418.

<center></center>

The report said the figure for China rose from 27% in 2013 to 32% in 2017, in India from 30% to 45% and in the US from 28% to 32%.
England, despite Premier League pride, are ranked 17th with 51%.
The report also said Portugal and Real Madrid player Cristiano Ronaldo dominated the use of social media by the players.

Ronaldo involved 570 million times on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram in the first five months of the year, well ahead of Neymar, with 294 million, and Messi with 201 million.
Engagement in this regard is not based on the number of followers, but shows how many people interacted with the account and gave a better idea of ​​their influence and influence.
The success of social media is not always related to success in the field, the report added. "Wider factors play a role, such as the ability to project a pleasant personality or an enviable lifestyle," the report said.

<center></center>
Real Madrid's controversial Sergio Ramos is fourth with 158 million and Liverpool and Mohamed Salah fifth with 105.3 million.
In terms of social media followers, Ronaldo also leads with 322.8 million on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook. While Neymar has 194.2 million and Messi 181.9 million.

author: saifulanwar
body:
Cristiano Ronaldo's sharpness on the green field will be in danger of fading with the presence of a Telstar 18 ball made by sporting equipment manufacturer Adidas. The ball, called will make the holder of 5 best difficult player titles when doing a free kick.

<center>![17.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmUbWJ33RS8ebHwjtt4CJRkJhn7cFmYvNskPp2gFf5oMcP)
</center>

The British media, The Sun, mentioned that Adidas claims that Telstar 18 is designed to reduce the level of ease of dipping and deflecting directions. Thus, players who often demonstrate a 'knuckle-ball' kick while executing a free kick will no longer be free to do so.
Adidas spent three years and millions of pounds sterling to develop the ball. They believe that Telstar 18 is the most perfect sports equipment ever made in the history of football.

<center>![8.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/Qmd6XZYdnGnwTng5DVdpWaozxBXo8VQwtMG5bCmgExxUyc)
</center>

Telstar 18 is said to have different material than other Adidas balls. The thickness of the layer of skin makes this ball can fly perfectly in the air if kicked properly.
To make this ball, they even conducted a test using a wind tunnel at Loughborough University, England. Test kicks using a robot is also done at Adidas headquarters in Germany.
To get the players accustomed, Adidas has given the ball to 32 countries participating in the 2018 World Cup. Of course, they do not want the 2018 World Cup performance to be the minimum goal because of the ball they make.

<center>![logo ksi.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmesKuh88q17hr6nnbRHPYQYzv46U26e2WNghLFbYEre3q)
</center>

<center>![DQmW2S31DwYAHqgs5ZxuyxPauKrxW4VNV8AT2R9TBeZHiMQ.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmVSh5BKCfGX2FY3uPsiST3z64DNxb1fboBd6PHEzBXudM)
</center>

body:
<center>![16.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmeNEaviaXggGSCZeHKvsATzWKh1nNMXHpYLVqhxhWUepD/16.jpg)</center>

Real Madrid reportedly submitted a new contract for striker Cristiano Ronaldo. However, the offer of Real Madrid is considered not satisfy the mega star.
Madrid called the new contract for a fee of 28.5 million pounds, or about Rp 529.7 billion per year. But the value is still below the salary of his arch-enemy, Lionel Messi, who paid from Barcelona for 31.2 million pounds, or about Rp 579.9 billion per year.
According to Spanish journalist Manolo Lama, Real Madrid also split Ronaldo's salary. A total of 22 million pounds is a basic salary while 6.5 million pounds in the form of bonuses if he won the Champions League, Spanish League, Copa del Rey and so forth.

<center>![6.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmS5VFKp5syQSBuejkN2tfRpQqZe8zFfaMRK4KDDinVoER/6.jpg)</center>

Real Madrid's offer did not fully satisfy Ronaldo. He considers himself worth more than Messi who is currently the highest paid footballer in the world.
Therefore, there is no news that Cristiano Ronaldo will soon sign a new contract at Real Madrid. The process of negotiation between the two sides is called sustainable. But Ronaldo mentioned will soon take decisions after the 2018 World Cup.

author: anak123
body:
<center>![29.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTDJQ8ttCPB1nD5i26cF6BbvVR4H7bX4ti5bqNo27m9YU/29.jpg)</center>

Barcelona star Lionel Messi explicitly exposed the tax cases that ensnare him in Spain. He accused Real Madrid of being behind the rise of the case.
In an interview with Spanish media Sport, Messi mentioned that the last few seasons are very difficult for him. The reason he got a massive attack from the Spanish tax authorities. He also accused Real Madrid of being behind the attack.

<center>![20.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmb6Tb4NB5W8kdsAMWg3Q95dfPoAZbDSdrL6cn31qysuum/20.jpg)</center>

"I've been through tough times, like everything related to the tax office, it's very difficult because of the way they attacked me and talked about me, my family, my father and the people behind me," he said.
"I felt the attack came from Real Madri and it was very difficult, I felt really diseratng but I was lucky to have the support of those close to me, Barcelona, ​​Catalunya and journalists here.That makes me a little more calm, he continued.
Lionel Messi is accused of not reporting his earnings of 10.2 million euros from the sale of his image rights in 2007 to 2009 then. Of that value, he called not paying 4.1 million euros taxes to the Spanish tax service.
Not only Lionel Messi, his father, Jorge Horacio Messi, was also accused of being involved in the case. Barcelona court finally convicted on Messi in June 2016 ago. His attempts to file an appeal until the appeal failed after the Spanish Supreme Court upheld the court's decision.
Lionel Messi's allegations to Real Madrid are quite plausible because after his case rolled out, a number of other Barcelona players were involved in a tax-hooked case. Defender Javier Mascherano, Dani Alves, to Neymar Jr. there are among them.
But recently a number of Real Madrid players are also involved in tax cases. Cristiano Ronaldo, Luka Modric, until Xabi Alonso was caught in the same case.

author: wr212
body:
The English Football Association (FA) is targeting their country's national team to reach the 2018 World Cup quarter-finals. They say the achievement will be seen as a "sign of real progress" after failing to win the knockout rounds in the same tournament over the past 12 years.

<center>![31.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQ7RdKnVhz4qWD7KuqtknxFtCc7ZWzzTrkHmSCid4eDqT/31.jpg)</center>
FA chief executive Martin Glenn delivered the target directly. "All we want is, and I will not give you one stage in the tournament ... but, I will give it a bit, we have not won a knockout match since 2006," he told the Daily Telegraph.
He continued, "So obviously, getting out of the group and winning the knockout rounds will be a real sign of progress, and if you manage to break through, you win more."
England, raised by Gareth Southgte, are in Group G of the World Cup with Belgium, Panama and Tunisia.
The 1966 World Cup winners failed to qualify from the group in 2014, when they were beaten by Italy and Uruguay, and lost 4-1 to Germany in the last 16 in 2010.
<center>![32.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdE4zgRDMi6x6cyg7UeExRWH9FfDnJyE34QGifxrSXLiC/32.jpg)</center>

They last won the knockout round in 2006 against Ecuador and they reached the quarter-finals.
If England qualify from their group, it will face opponents from Group H, which is filled with Poland, Senegal, Colombia and Japan. Victory in the last 16 will likely lead them against Brazil or the German champions in the last eight.

<center>![11.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdwVw6ZYe4vcaTEfH9t3e4saSYdZ388xo3AwoGJw3hnyB/11.jpg)

A football world-cup prediction contest has been organised by @blocktrades, @acidyo and @anomadsoul and this is my entry to the contest.
