author: sanne
body:
With a last day until the 2018 World Cup begins!!

Hi Stemian, I will give you an analysis of Group A world cup and my prediction of how well they will do. https://img.esteem.ws/ryfj4nw7gs.jpg Image Uruguay national team became the strongest candidate to win the Group A 2018 World Cup which contains host Russia, Egypt and Saudi Arabia. Group A World Cup is a group with balanced competition. Russia national team, national team of Uruguay, national team of Egypt, and national team of Saudi Arabia have a good chance to pass to round of 16 play-off. https://img.esteem.ws/l424s4ydog.jpg Image **Coach**: Óscar Washington Tabárez **Captain**: Diego Godin **Top Player**: Luis Suarez, Edison Cavani

Uruguay

From team material, Uruguay is a decent team to occupy the favorite position to qualify for the round of 16 large. They have top-level players like Luis Suarez, Edinson Cavani, and Diego Godin. From the FIFA rankings, Uruguay became the country with the highest ranking (14), followed by Egypt (45), Saudi Arabia (67), and Russia (70). Three trials in 2018 also always led to victory for Uruguay. https://img.esteem.ws/f975jzw95v.jpg Image **Coach**: Stanislav Cherchesov **Captain**: Igor Akinfev **Top Player**: Alan Dzagoev, Yuri Shirkov

Russia

Despite having the worst ratings, Russia will get full support because they are status as a host. The problem is, Russia is undergoing a preparation period to the World Cup with poor results. They are three defeats and one draw in four trials held since 2018. Drawn further, Russia won just one victory in 10 last test match. If coach Stanislav Cherchesov can not lift the players' mental and confidence, then Russia will experience the fate of South Africa who failed to qualify for the preliminary round at the 2010 World Cup. https://img.esteem.ws/ha4x4ryfla.jpg Image **Coach**: Hector Cuper **Captain**: Mohamed Salah **Top Player**: Mohamed Salah

Egypt

Egypt is also in poor condition. After making sure to qualify for the 2018 World Cup, Egypt actually never win in five trials throughout 2018. In addition to regulating confidence, Egypt also awaits Mohamed Salah's condition. If Salah really won the race against time to heal the injury, then it will improve the team's morale. In addition to Salah, Egypt has a number of other players who also appear in the English League starting from Mohamed Elneny, Ramadan Sobhi, Ali Gabr, and Ahmed Elmohamady. https://img.esteem.ws/ps3qmbrsj6.jpg Image **Coach**: Juan Antonio Pizzi **Captain**: Osama Hawsawi **Top Player**: Mohamed Al-Sahlawi

Saudi Arabia

The Saudi national team is the country with the most tested list in 2018 compared to the other three countries. Saudi Arabia seemed to affirm they did not want to be cheerful in this tournament. Of the nine games played, Saudi Arabia earned three victories, one draw, and five defeats. The first match of Group A is a Russian duel against Saudi Arabia and Egypt versus Uruguay. These duel have an important role in the fate of four teams in the hunt for tickets to the round of 16 play-off. Saudi Arabia could take advantage of stage fright suffered by Russia as host. If Russia fails to get full points in the match against Saudi Arabia, then they are in danger. Conversely, the winner of the Egyptian duel against Uruguay will have a great chance to qualify. But the losers are not directly eliminated. So .. let's watch with the World Up stage of 2018 group A and who will qualify for the next phase?

My Prediction Score of Group A:

Score | Team | | Team | Score -|-|-|-|- 2 | Russia | vs | Saudi Arabia | 1 1 | Egypt | vs | Uruguay | 1 1 | Russia | vs | Egypt | 0 3 | Uruguay | vs | Saudi Arabia | 1 1 | Uruguay | vs | Russia | 1 0 | Saudi Arabia | vs | Egypt | 2

Thanks @blocktrades who have sponsored a World Cup contest run by @acidyo and @anomadsoul. And I think it would be nice to join @acidyo in "The Steem FIFA World Cup Fantasy League" for information here , for that! Come on Stemian, the best part is you have a chance to win with me @sanne!!

https://img.esteem.ws/iy3zqb0efd.jpg By @rizalzzz Banner, here

body:
The 2018 FIFA World Cup is the world's largest soccer tournament, will be held in 11 cities in Russia, starting from: 14 Jun 2018 - 15 Jul 2018. This is the 21st international ball tournament, followed by men's national team of 32 FIFA member countries .

![23E01A21-0F92-407F-9BB4-26C139F214AD.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTMBfBCxGVwpRtndywpwR1x8fXr6N8o9pYpcA7gWTRhb1/23E01A21-0F92-407F-9BB4-26C139F214AD.jpeg)

![B136CE25-3E19-436F-B612-6BECD61DAA72.jpeg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmeWVb9JbgafhZoahrHvF8aazH1fPuTpcfzEUY9U6KQtzV/B136CE25-3E19-436F-B612-6BECD61DAA72.jpeg)

Although many doubted Brazil, my favourite tim is Brasil, as the 2018 Word Cup Champion. I love Pele, and Brazil always teaches the world about beautiful art in football.

# Russia vs Saudi Arabia

The first party will be the opening match between Russia against Saudi Arabia, and there will be billions of eyes attended from various parts of the world. Russia as home place, get previlege, among others by getting a chance to pass directly to the round of 32 and join in group A, and with Uruguay, Egypt and Saudi Arabia.

This prediction is based on analysis by looking at the last five matches of these two teams. Russia and Saudi Arabia in the last five games. So Russia will win 2: 0 against Saudi Arabia.

author: worldcup-russia
body:
With less than 2 hours until the biggest sports event of the year starts, we decided to bring you a small analysis of the 8 world cup groups and our predictions of how good they´ll do. Now, we bring you Group B. ### PORTUGAL:
The latest Euro Cup Champions, the Portuguese team gets to Russia with the highest morale ever after conquering the cup celebrated in France in 2016, a result that impressed everyone who watched on one of the hardest matches ever against the host team. This match was won based on great team work and orde on every line of the field, with the handicap of not counting with their best man and captain, Cristiano Ronaldo who left early on due to an injury; this situation helped to clarify that even thought Cristiano is the best Lusitan man on the field, Portugal as a team do not depend on him to win hard games. Today, for the first time in quite a while, Portugal´s team counts on their lines top tier players to help Ronaldo balance the every game against some of the best teams in case they reach the knockout stage... players like Bernanrdo Silva from Manchester City, Joao Mario from West Ham, Pepe ex Real Madrid, Goncalo Guedes from PSG, and Ricardo Quaresma... It will be very interesting to see how this group of players develop as the games keep coming. Head Coach: Fernando Santos Captain: Cristiano Ronaldo Stars: Cristiano Ronaldo Participations: 7 Best place: Third place How long will they go?: Best 8
https://cdn.colombia.com/sdi/2018/04/27/seleccion-de-portugal-630669.jpg
[Source](https://cdn.colombia.com/sdi/2018/04/27/seleccion-de-portugal-630669.jpg )
### SPAIN:
In the modern times, the red one has always been a solid candidate to winning the world cup, not only because of its individually skilled players but also due to the great team work they´ve managed to achieve. The team´s playing style is the same throughout all their divisions, from the children division through the under-17 and under-21 to the profesional team. The spanish team who won the 2010 South Africa world cup is not the same playing today, but even so, Spain is aiming high on this tournament and we expect them to reach the final match in order to not call their participation a failure. Lead by the historic veteran Andres Iniesta, who is probably playing his last official tournament, along with the shooting star Isco and the two Sergios (Ramos and Busquets), Spain will strive to find a balance between the younglings and the sport veterans and win their 2nd world cup. Head Coach: Julen Lopetegui Captain: Sergio Ramos Stars: Andres Iniesta Participations: 15 Best place: Champions (2010) How long will they go?: Semifinals
http://e00-marca.uecdn.es/assets/multimedia/imagenes/2018/03/23/15218407518214.jpg
[Source](http://e00-marca.uecdn.es/assets/multimedia/imagenes/2018/03/23/15218407518214.jpg )
### MOROCCO:
Despite having a long history in football, Morocco hasn´t managed to trascend once on an international level excepting that African cup they won in 1998 and reaching the final game of the same tournament in 2004. This will be their 5th world cup and the Marrakesh team are striving to have a good performance based on colective effort and perhaps reaching the knockout stage, a scenario that seems pretty hard due to them sharing the same group with Spain and Portugal. The Marrakesh head coach will have to pull every ace of his sleeve and to bring out the best of each of his players if he wants to surprise every one. Head Coach: Hervé Renard Captain: Mehdi Benatia Stars: Nordin Amrabat Participations: 5 Best place: Best 16 How long will they go?: Group Stage
https://www.critica.com.pa/sites/default/files/imagenes/2018/03/12/marruecos.jpg
[Source]( https://www.critica.com.pa/sites/default/files/imagenes/2018/03/12/marruecos.jpg)
### IRAN:
The same as Morocco, Iran is also playing its 5th world cup and even though they´ve never gone farther than the group stage, this year the fans are expecting them trascend on this hard group and to give the people the happiness of reaching the knockout stage for the first time ever. The three consecutive times Champion of the Asian cup, Iran has step by step lost the protagonism they used to have, nonetheless, in recent times they became a usual team joining the world cup every four years and no team should be too confident about easily beating the Iranians, where teams without any stars whatsoever have reached the very last stage based on effort discipline and courage. Several Iranian players play in European clubs, so they already know how it is to play on an internaional level and they won´t be intimidated, some of them play are starters in the Russian, Dutch and Greel leagues. Head Coach: Carlos Queiroz Captain: Masoud Shojaei Stars: Ehjsan Hajsafi Participations: 5 Best place: Group Stage How long will they go?: Group Stage
https://www.abc.es/media/deportes/2017/12/01/seleccion-iran-espana-kEuB--620x349@abc.jpg
[Source]( https://www.abc.es/media/deportes/2017/12/01/seleccion-iran-espana-kEuB--620x349@abc.jpg )

@blocktrades loves to sponsor this type of community engaging projects and @anomadsoul & @acidyo know a lot of Steemians love this game, so we decided to organize this enormous Football World Cup event.

RULES

author: anak123
body:
Not just a busy soccer player ahead of the 2018 World Cup, every participating country in the tournament also sends beautiful women to the beauty contest, Miss World Cup 2018, which takes place at Europa Park Rust Germany, Germany on June 8, 2018. One week before the first game World Cup 2018 begins, crown Miss World Cup 2018 won by Belgian delegate, Zoe Brunet, 18 years.

<center>![34.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmVQVbiyMAMEjAVsbJhMnVGEErGtUQNbFRHvVMEhXjiqUE/34.jpg)</center>

Like the World Cup matches, there are 8 groups from 4 competing countries. After the group stage, representatives from Belgium, Zoe Brunet, managed to beat the envoys from Germany, Anahita Rehbein, and Denmark, Amanda Petri. "I am proud of this title, I hope the Belgian national team will do the same as me and win the World Cup," said Zoe Brunet, quoted by Sputnik News.

<center>![35.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdEpwv2ZVzXFGSdSauvXJsHjzh5SbNQnLoZuukzGu2nvX/35.jpg)</center>

So, what are 32 contestants from the participating countries of the World Cup in the Miss World Cup 2018? Almost the same as the beauty contest in general, each participant must demonstrate knowledge in the affairs of football and their skills in the preferred field. Do not miss selection by wearing evening gowns and bikinis.
The 2018 World Cup jury is an expert in sports and sports entertainment, such as Suzan and David Odonkor, football coaches and former soccer players. Not only that, Jana Azizi, Sky sport presenter, Ruth Hofmann, Sport1 presenter, and Waldemar Hartmann, moderator of ARD, are also the judges for this event.
Accompanied by Jorg Althoff, Head of Sports BILD Süd, and Walter Eschweiler, former FIFA referees and sports diplomats at Miss World Cup 2014 Foreign Office Daniela Ocoro, Francis Prsa and Famous Face Director Sevgi Schäfer helped decide the 2018 World Cup.

<center>![WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdR5h248eo3vteRUjMGCoDVRa7rBjyBLeWKf59DfRKF8o/WorldCup-Contest-2018.gif)</center>

author: saiful46
body:
<center>![36.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmbJWR23eHYEyBToBe9BZEtSKbvNYHSTuNwHZaijV2cqnQ/36.jpg)</center>
World Cup 2018 starts rolling June 14. The biggest football competition in the world is followed by 32 teams, who will compete for trophies.
The trophy became a symbol and a symbol of pride for the champion. Here are some facts about the contested trophy already 1930.
1. Nike Goddess
The first World Cup was named by third FIFA President, Julies Rimet. The French-born president became the man responsible for creating and hosting the World Cup tournament, after he qualified in a vote to begin the global football championship in 1929.
The first trophy was designed by Abel Lafleur with the design of Nike's Greek Victory Goddess.
The shape of the trophy is like a woman holding a cup. The woman has wings like fairies. This trophy is made of pure silver plated gold with the nickname 'The Golden Goddness'.
And the name was changed in honor of the third FIFA President, then after the second World Cup in 1946, the name of the trophy was renamed the Jules Rimet Cup.
2. Ever Stolen
In 1966 precisely on March 22, 1966 the trophy disappeared when exhibited at Westminster Central Hall, England, 4 months before the host country tournament. This trophy is worth £ 30,000.
Two days later after the theft, the English Football Association (FA) received a packet from an unknown person containing the top of the trophy and a letter with a message from a thief who wanted a ransom of € 15,000 for the trophy to be returned.
The FA and the British police devised a strategy to trap the thief and ultimately succeed. On March 27, the alleged actor was named Edward Betchley, but Edward's capture did not reveal the whole truth and the existence of the trophy.
However, in South London, a dog named Pickles finds a newspaper-wrapped trophy, the owner of Dave Corbett's dog returns the cup, and receives a reward of £ 6,000, Pickles produces a lifetime of food supplies.
3. FIFA World Cup
For the 1974 championship, a new trophy was designed and made, after receiving many designs, eventually one winner was selected.
The winner is an Italian sculptor named Silvio Gazzaniga. One of the two designs he sent was chosen to be the winner. He later became the UEFA Cup designer and the UEFA Super Cup.
The World Cup trophy is made of 18 carat gold and is based on malasite, and depicts two human figures holding the earth. The winning country team will be carved in the bottom of the trophy.
The cup is usually kept by the winning team, but it is no longer done. Now the winners receive a gold-plated bronze replica. The original World Cup trophy was kept at the FIFA World Football Museum in Zurich, Switzerland.

<center>![7.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmRpFTif3XHfTvuRDxRNkvk3exCfotNUCNswUfsTorNS9s/7.jpg)</center>

author: the-alien
body:
![Alt Text](https://wallpaperhdzone.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/nike-soccer-wallpaper-HD1.jpg)

Despite my love for the sport, I never write about football (soccer), so what better time than in the biggest competition in the world, right? Plus, why not  to help get some momentum to the [@blocktrades World Cup Contest](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/you-still-have-time-join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-and-win-2-000-sbd-in-prizes) and also to get the conversation going as these events sometimes have a great way for making communities come together.

Without further ado, here are my predictions for Group A of the 2018 World Cup:


Russia, the host of the big event opens the show facing off with Saudi Arabia,  one of the most modest teams in this world cup editions. Without a doubt, luck has favored the home team.

Hell, they are leading the score as we speak.

In the second game of match day one, Uruguay is taking on Egypt at a time were things are not looking especially well for the Pharaons. Egypt is missing their star player and best African player of the year Mo Salah.

And that’s no small absence since Salah is widely regarded as one of the most decisive players in the world, and a clear contender to next year’s Ballon D’Or.

Uruguay on the other hand seems like a new kind of dangerous, much more so than in other previous competitions.

At the base, they still maintain their usual core strength in both defence and attack. 

The backline is firmly secured by Atletico Madrid's duo Diego Godín and José María Giménez forming one of the strongest defensive partnerships in the world.

On the attacking front, the same remains true for Uruguay given the massive firepower contributed by Luis Suarez and Cavani, two of the best strikers in world football.

The middle of the park is one area that Uruguay were struggling with for years - Some even say that since Enzo Francescoli - but the emergence of so many young talents recently (Betancourt, Torreira, Vecino, Valverde...etc) is finally compensating their midfield rendering them the most compensated squad in the group.

I think it’s fairly safe to say that Uruguay will finish on the top of the group. The question is who goes second?

![Alt Text](https://www.edigitalagency.com.au/wp-content/uploads/Mohamed-Salah-wallpaper-hd-photo-liverpool-football-player-open-arms-april-2018-red-shirt.jpg)

My guess is that it’s not going to be decided until the last game of the group between Russia and Egypt, given the fact that Saudi Arabia would finish last with all probability

If I had to bet, I’d go for Egypt because so many games get decided on small details, and in that sense Egypt is a slight favorite.

 For instance, the game-changing ability of a world class player like Salah is far greater than that of Aleksandr Golovin, Russia’s main man.

But then again, there’s always the uck factor coming in as many forms as the devil has names: Unexpected injuries, hitting the woodwork so many times, or even in the form of a distracted referee… You name it.

## Group A Final Predictions:

![Alt Text](https://wallpapercave.com/wp/wc1742631.jpg)

Uruguay finishes first, Saudi Arabia finishes last, and the second and third places is a coin toss between Egypt and the host team, Russia.

### How about you? What are your predictions?

*Image Sources: [1](https://wallpaperhdzone.com/nike-soccer-wallpaper-hd/) - [2](https://www.edigitalagency.com.au/best-mohamed-salah-wallpaper-hd-photos/) - [3](https://wallpapercave.com/nike-soccer-wallpaper-2017)*

author: wr212
body:
<center>![37.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmSf3MuooNzNyoa74KJjVRatKmBiwHGcEPGbAoAHHhwzso/37.jpg)</center>

Young goalkeeper Muhammad Raffa Rolly Casillas will represent Indonesia in the opening parade of the 2018 World Cup, held at the Luzhniki Stadium, Moscow, today. The 12-year-old will perform with representatives from 211 countries, who previously joined the Football for Friendship program, organized by the World Football Federation and Russian energy company Gazprom.
Raffa says it is very proud to represent Indonesia in mini football for the Friendship tournament. Together with his friends, Raffa attended the parade exercise on Wednesday morning. "This is the first time I can see directly the World Cup, do not expect to also participate in the opening parade," he said on the sidelines of the program Football for Friendship at Lokomotiv Stadium, Moscow.

<center>![11.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmdwVw6ZYe4vcaTEfH9t3e4saSYdZ388xo3AwoGJw3hnyB/11.jpg)</center>

According to Raffa, many valuable experiences can be taken by playing in teams that contain children from different countries. Despite the different languages ​​and cultures, Raffa does not find it difficult to communicate with his teammates. "The language of football in my opinion the same and easy to understand, the important thing to speak in the field let me communicate fluently," he said.
According to the Chairman of the Football Program for Friendship Vladimir Sherov, able to bring children from all over the world to the opening of the 2018 World Cup is a pride and honor for Russia. "They will carry the flag of their respective countries," he said.
Secretary General of the All Indonesia Football Association (PSSI) Queen Tisha Destria, who attended the FIFA congress in Moscow took the opportunity to attend the stadium where the Football for Friendship program was held. "This program is extraordinary and PSSI is very supportive to send two Indonesian children, it is not about the match but also the friendship and other noble values ​​of football," said Tisha.
In addition to Raffa, there is Alfonso Hutabarat, who came to join the Football for Friendship program as a child journalist. Alfonso also hosted the third day of Football for Friendship in a broadcast program on YouTube.

<center>![10.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmPmt9tAuCd2CFiL1EvM7UW3Ac7ntahMKtcDrC7xmq2pvr/10.jpg)</center>

7 - Ang pinakamababang reputasyon ay 40. Para maiwasan ang pagsali ng mga bots. 

8 - Pede mo isumite ang iyong artikulo hanggang Hunyo 14 2018 00:01 AM, UTC na oras.

##### <center>Ang pagtala ng puntos: Kada tamang hula sa Group Stage, ay mabibigyan ka ng isang (1) puntos. Sa pagtapos ng turneyo, ang kabuoang premyo ay hahatiin sa mga pinakamataas na pumuntos na Steemians. Ang numero ng mga gagantipalaan na Steemians ay depende sa numero ng lalahok.</center> 

<hr>

Hoy @blocktrades, paano yun pangalawang yugto ng turneyo, ang **knockout stage?**

Ang **Group Stage** ay magtatapos sa Hunyo 28 (Oras ng Russia) at ang Knockout stage ay magsisimula sa Hunyo 30. Kami ay magbibigay ng anunsyo sa account na @worldcup-russia pagtapos ng Hunyo 28 para malaman nyo kung paano ang **Knockout Stage**

Lahat ay pwede sumali sa parehong yugto at ang mga mananalo ay pipiliin sa pamamagitan ng pagdagdag ng lahat ng puntos ng parehong yugto.

Sana ay maging maswerte ang lahat at simulan na ang paghula!!

#### <center> Pwede mong ipasa ang iyong artikulo hanggang sa Hunyo 14 2018 sa 00:01 AM, UTC na oras.</center>
<hr>
Ito ay palaro na dinadaos ni @blocktrades, kung gusto mo ang ginagawa nya, iboto si @blocktrades na witness [dito](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

Ito ay isang palaro na inayos ni @acidyo at @anomadsoul, kung gusto mo ang kanilang ginagawa ay iboto ang @ocd-witness para witness [dito](https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

author: theaustrianguy
body:
###
Kein Witz: ein Preispool von sage und schreibe 2.000 (zweitausend!!!) SBD und JEDER der einen Beitrag posten kann, kann mitmachen!
In nicht einmal 14 Tagen beginnt das größte Sportevent der Welt: Die Fußballweltmeisterschaft, diesmal ausgetragen in Russland.
![football-3344911_1280.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmasw3c1KSpM16SJZZszcF83u5wyGejsaLWCngPnS5xkFF/football-3344911_1280.png)
[Quelle](https://pixabay.com/de/fußball-sport-leder-ballsport-3344911/)
Da @blocktrades sehr gerne diese Art von gemeinschaftsfördernden Projekten unterstützt und @acidyo und @anomadsoul wissen, dass sehr viele Steemians dieses Spiel lieben, haben sie beschlossen, ein gigantisches Weltmeisterschafts-Event auf die Beine zu stellen.
Du musst keine professionelle Erfahrung im Bereich der Spielanalyse vorweisen können, dein Land muss nicht einmal an der WM teilnehmen und du musst auch nicht viel über Fußball wissen, um teilnehmen zu können. Alles was du tun musst, ist, einen Beitrag zu verfassen, wo du für jedes Match einen Sieger auswählst - Der Steemian mit den meisten Punkten, gewinnt! ##
So einfach ist es
####
Hey @acidyo, Ich will einen Teil dieser 2.000 SBD, wie kann ich mitmachen?
Es ist einfach: Die Weltmeisterschaft ist in zwei Abschnitte aufgeteilt, die Gruppenphase und die Finalrunde. Für die Gruppenphase dieser @blocktrades Weltmeisterschaft musst du nichts tun, außereinen Beitrag mit deinen Spielvorhersagen für folgende Spiele zu posten: ####
Russia v Saudi Arabia
####
Egypt v Uruguay
####
Morocco v Iran
####
Portugal v Spain

France v Australia
####
Argentina v Iceland

####

####

####
Uruguay v Russia
####
Saudi Arabia v Egypt
####
Spain v Morocco
####

####
Denmark v France
####

####

####
Mexico v Sweden
####
Serbia v Brazil
####
Switzerland v Costa Rica
####
Japan v Poland
####
Senegal v Colombia
####
England v Belgium
####
Panama v Tunisia
Alles was du tun musst, ist, einen Beitrag zu erstellen, wo du für jeden Spiel mit W (für den Sieg), L (für eine Niederlage) und T (für ein Unentschieden) den Ausgang des Spiels markierst. ##
Falls ihr ein Beispiel sehen wollt, wie ihr an der Blocktrades Weltmeisterschaft teilnehmen könnt, [klickt hier](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@mexico-trail/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections)
Hey @anomadsoul, gibt es Regeln?
Ja, ein paar einfache Regeln gibt es:
##
REGELN
1 - Der Titel des Beitrages muss wie folgt lauten: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections 2 - Dein Beitrag muss einen Link zu diesem Originalbeitrag: [LINK](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes) enthalten. 3 - Benutzt das selbe Format wie in obigem Beispiellink, damit wir die Einreichungen gut organisiert sammeln können. 4 - Verwendet die Tags blocktradesworldcup und mypicks 5 - Resteemt diesen Originalbeitrag: [LINK](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes). Wir wollen hunderte Teilnahmen. 6 - Nachdem ihr den Beitrag verfasst habt, könnt ihr eure Tipps nicht mehr ändern. Überlegt also bitte gut, bevor ihr den Beitrag veröffentlicht. 7 - Die Mindestreputation zur Teilnahme ist 40, um die Teilnahme von Bots bzw. Zweitaccounts zu erschweren. Aber ihr habt ja eh noch knapp zwei Wochen Zeit, diese zu erreichen! 8 - Die Teilnahme ist bis 14.06.2018 um 02:01 (CEST) bzw. 00:01 (UTC) möglich! ####
Punkteschlüssel: Für jedes korrekt getippte Spiel der Gruppenphase, bekommst du einen (1) Punkt. Am Ende des Wettbewerbs, wird das Preisgeld unter den Teilnehmern mit den meisten Gesamtpunkten aufgeteilt. Die Anzahl an Steemians, die belohnt wird, hängt von der Menge an Einreichungen ab, die wir erhalten.
Und @blocktrades, wie sieht es mit dem zweiten Turnierabschnitt, der Finalrunde aus? Die Gruppenphase endet am 28. Juni (russische Zeit) und die Finalrunde beginnt am 30. Juni. Nach dem 28. Juni wird mit dem Account @worldcup-russia eine Ankündigung gepostet werden, wie der Wettbewerb in der Finalrunde funktioniert. Natürlich werde ich auch wieder versuchen, zeitnah eine deutschsprachige Übersetzung zu liefern. Jeder darf an beiden Abschnitten teilnehmen, die Gewinner werden anhand der addierten Gesamtpunktezahl bestimmt! Viel Glück und lasset das Tippen beginnen! ###
Euren Beitrag zur Teilnahme könnt ihr bis zum 14.06.2018 um 02:01 (CEST) bzw. 00:01 (UTC) veröffentlichen!
Dieses Tippspiel wird von @blocktrades gesponsert. Wenn euch gefällt, was dieser tut, votet [hier](https://steemit.com/~witnesses) für @blocktrades als Witness. Dieses Tippspiel wird von @acidyo & @anomadsoul organisiert. Wenn euch gefällt, was die beiden machen, votet [hier](https://steemit.com/~witnesses) für @ocd-witness als Witness. *** *** *** ## Hinweise zur Übersetzung *Dieser Beitrag ist eine Übersetzung der englischsprachigen Originalankündigung: [Join the @blocktrades World Cup | 2,000 SBD in Prizes!](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes) - bitte bei Verlinkung/Resteem diesen als Bezug nehmen!* *Weiters muss die Teilnahme aus organisatorischen Gründen auf englisch erfolgen - dies sollte mit dem verlinkten Beispielpost und dieser deutschen Anleitung jedoch kein Problem sein denke ich ;)* *Ich hoffe die Übersetzung war so weit verständlich und ihr wisst genau was ihr tun müsst, um beim Wettkampf um 2.000 SBD mitzumachen. Solltet ihr noch Fragen haben, könnt ihr mir diese natürlich gerne hier auf deutsch stellen!* *** __Viel Glück und liebe Grüße, Martin__

author: yasu24
body:
This is an article on how to participate in @blocktrades World Cup. I translated it into Japanese so that Japanese people can participate easily. I arranged a little.

みなさん、こんにちは。@yasu24です。

今日の記事は、@blocktradesさんがスポンサーとして、 @acidyoさんと @anomadsoulさんが企画者として携わってくださっている @blocktrades World Cupに参加する方法について書きました。

基本的には、[Join the @blocktrades World Cup | 2,000 SBD in Prizes!](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes)を翻訳したものですが、少しアレンジしています。私の上手くない翻訳だとは思いますが、より多くの方に参加していただけたら、と思っています。よろしくお願いします。

それでは、以下翻訳です。

@blocktrades World Cup / 賞金プール 2,000SBD

誰もが、この企画に参加することが出来ます。楽しむことが出来ます。賞金プールは 2,000 SBDです。

2週間後、世界最大のスポーツイベント、サッカーワールドカップが始まります。今回はロシアで開催されます。

![13F7A317-3F21-4B37-8AAF-2942A95BCAB8.png](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQHoMixkagzHUHfj5xXHVBhQZZuZDJnHyvn7Ak6Tf8eEo/13F7A317-3F21-4B37-8AAF-2942A95BCAB8.png)

<center>[Source](https://talksport.com/football/russia-world-cup-2018-fixtures-dates-kick-off-time-stadium-group-stage-match)</center>

@blocktradesさんは、このような Stseemitコミュニティが盛り上がるプロジェクトを応援するのが大好きだそうです。また、 @acidyoさん、@anomadsoulさんは、多くの Steemiansがこのようなゲームを好んでいることを知っているので、今回、大規模なサッカーワールドカップコンテスト を開催することにしたそうです。

プロのアナリストである必要はありません。あなたの国の代表が大会に参加する必要はありません。参加するためにサッカーについての多くの知識も必要ありません。

参加するために必要なのは、すべての試合の勝者と、最も多くのポイントを獲得する Steemianを選ぶ投稿を書くことだけです。

「@acidyoさん、私は2,000 SBDの一部がほしいです。どうすれば、私は参加できますか？」

それは、とても簡単です：ワールドカップには、グループステージと決勝トーナメントという2つのステージがあります。

この @blocktradesカップのグループステージでは、それぞれの試合であなたの試合予想をします。

<center>Russia v Saudi Arabia</center>
<center>Egypt v Uruguay</center>
<center>Morocco v Iran</center>
<center>Portugal v Spain</center>
<center>France v Australia</center>
<center>Argentina v Iceland</center>
<center>Peru v Denmark</center>
<center>Croatia v Nigeria</center>
<center>Costa Rica v Serbia</center>
<center>Germany v Mexico</center>
<center>Brazil v Switzerland</center>
<center>Sweden v South Korea</center>
<center>Belgium v Panama</center>
<center>Tunisia v England</center>
<center>Poland v Senegal</center>
<center>Colombia v Japan</center>
<center>Russia v Egypt</center>
<center>Portugal v Morocco</center>
<center>Uruguay v Saudi Arabia</center>
<center>Iran v Spain</center>
<center>France v Peru</center>
<center>Denmark v Australia</center>
<center>Argentina v Croatia</center>
<center>Brazil v Costa Rica</center>
<center>Nigeria v Iceland</center>
<center>Serbia v Switzerland</center>
<center>Belgium v Tunisia</center>
<center>Germany v Sweden</center>
<center>South Korea v Mexico</center>
<center>England v Panama</center>
<center>Japan v Senegal</center>
<center>Poland v Colombia</center>
<center>Uruguay v Russia</center>
<center>Saudi Arabia v Egypt</center>
<center>Spain v Morocco</center>
<center>Iran v Portugal</center>
<center>Denmark v France</center>
<center>Australia v Peru</center>
<center>Nigeria v Argentina</center>
<center>Iceland v Croatia</center>
<center>South Korea v Germany</center>
<center>Mexico v Sweden</center>
<center>Serbia v Brazil</center>
<center>Switzerland v Costa Rica</center>
<center>Japan v Poland</center>
<center>Senegal v Colombia</center>
<center>England v Belgium</center>
<center>Panama v Tunisia</center>


参加するためにしなければならないことは、各試合のW（勝利）、L（失う）、T（同点）を予想する投稿を作ることだけです。

Blocktrades Cupに参加する方法の例を見る必要がある場合は、[ここ](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@mexico-trail/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections)をクリックしてください。

「@anomadsoulさん、何かルールはありますか？」

はい、いくつかの簡単なルールがあります。

ルール 1 - 記事のタイトルは、 The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections でなければなりません。
ルール 2 - 記事に[このリンク](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes)を含める必要があります。
ルール 3 - [このリンク](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@mexico-trail/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections)に含まれる形式を使用して、予想を作成することが出来ます。
ルール 4 - #blocktradesworldcup #mypicksを使用してください。
ルール 5 - この投稿をリスチームしてください。何百ものエントリーを希望されているそうです。 
ルール 6 - あなたが記事を投稿したら、それを編集することはできません。投稿する前にあなたの選択を徹底的に考えてください。  ルール 7 - 参加するために40以上のリピュテーションスコアが必要です。これはボットの参加を避けるためです。
ルール 8 - 2018年6月14日午前0時01分（UTCタイムゾーン）まで応募できます。 

スコアリング：グループステージで予想が当たるごとに、1ポイントが与えられます。カップの終わりに、賞金プールは最高得点のSteemiansの間で分割されます。 報酬の量は、この企画にエントリーする人数によって異なります。

@blocktradesさん、カップの第2ステージは、決勝トーナメントはどうですか？ グループステージは6月28日（ロシア時間）に終了し、決勝トーナメントは6月30日に開始されます。 誰もが両方のステージに参加することができ、勝者は両方のステージの得点合計によって決定されます。 2018年6月14日午前0時01分（UTCタイムゾーン）までに応募を送信できます。 これは@blocktradesがさんがスポンサーをしてくださっているコンテストです。もしよかったら、 @blocktradesさんへのSteemit Witnessの投票をお願いします。 また、@acidyoさん、@anomadsoulさんが企画してくださっています。もしよかったら、 @ ocd-witnessへのSteemit-Witnessの投票をお願いします。

author: oendertuerk
body:
<center>
#### Evet! Doğru okudun! Şaka değil: 2.000 SBD'lik ödül havuzu ve Steemit'de Post yazabilen HERKES bu eğlenceye katılabilir!</center>

---

<center>Dünyanın en büyük futbol etkinliğinin başlamasına sadece 14 gün kaldı: Evet, Rusya'nın konuk ettiği Dünya Kupası.</center>

#

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png
<center><sub><sub>[source](https://talksport.com/football/russia-world-cup-2018-fixtures-dates-kick-off-time-stadium-group-stage-match)</sub></sub></center>

#

<center>@blocktrades'in topluluklarla ilgi projelere sponsor olmayı çok sevidiğinden ve @acidyo & @anomadsoul sizin bu oyunu çok sevdiğinizi iyi bildiklerinden bu muhteşem Futbol Dünya Kupası etkinliğini düzenlemeye karar vermişler.</center>

---

<center>Futbol oyunun profesyonel bir analisti olmak zorunda değilsiniz, milli takımınızın katılmasıda gerekmiyor, futbol ile ilgili hic bir şey öğrenmenizede gerek yok...</center>

<center>Yapmanız gereken tek şey, kazanacak olan takımları seçmeniz ve en çok puan alan Steemian kazanır.</center>
<center>
### Bu kadar basit.</center>
#

<center>Hey @acidyo, o 2.000 SBD'nin bir parçasını istiyorum, nasıl katılabilirim?</center>

---

<center>Çok kolay: Dünya kupasında iki aşama var, Grup Aşaması ve  sonrki final Eleme Aşaması.</center>

<center>Bu @blocktrades'in kupası Grup Aşaması için, aşadaki listenen her maçı tahminlerinizle ilgili bir post yapmanız gerekiyor:</center>

<center>
### NOT: Takımların isimleri *inglizce* olması ve *W*'yi, *L*'yi ve *T*'yi olduğu gibi yazmanız şart !
### Bunun nedeni yüzlerce üyenin katıilması ve her postu elden kontrol edilmesi saatler veya günler değilde haftalar tutar diye bot kullanılması. </center>

---
<center>
## [Buraya tıkladığınızda](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@mexico-trail/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections) bir örnek posta yönlenmiş olursunuz.</center>

---

<center>Hey @anomadsoul, herhangi bir kural var mı?</center>

<center>Evet, birkaç basit kural var:</center>

<center>
## Kurallar</center>
#
---

1 - Postunuzun başlığı aynen bu şekil olmalı : ***The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections***

2 - Yazdığınız posta mutlaka orjinal postun linki olmalı --->>> [orjinal post](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes)

3 - Katılım postunuzu gösterdíğimiz linkteki örnek gibi formatlayın.

4 - Etiketler yani tag olarak ***blocktradesworldcup*** ve ***mypicks*** kullanın.

5 - [Burdaki orjinal post](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes)u resteem etmeniz katılmanız icin şart, yüzlerce steemian'in katılmasını istiyoruz.

6 - Postunuzu yazdınızmı bir daha değiştiremessiniz. Değiştirdğiniz an oyundan elenirsiniz. Bot ona göre yazıldı. O yüzden tahminlerinizi iyi düşünerek yapıp yazın.

7 - Katılmak için Reputation'iniz en az 40 olmalıdır. Bu, hem botların hemde fake hesapların abuse etmemesi içindir.

8 - Giriş yani katılma postunuz en gec 14 Haziran 2018 tarihi ve saat 00:01 UTCye kadar yazabilirisiniz.
 
#

### Puanlama: Grup Aşamasında yaptığınız her doğru tahminiz için bir (1) puan kazanacaksınız. Kupanın sonunda, ödül havuzu en skorer Steemianler arasında bölüştürülecektir. Ödüllendirilen steemianlerin sayısı, aldığımız kayıtların sayısına bağlı olacaktır.

---

Hey @blocktrades, kupanın ikinci aşaması, yani final nakavt aşaması nasil ve ne zaman olacak?

Grup aşaması 28 Haziran'da (Rus saati) sona erecek ve final nakavt aşaması 30 Haziran'da başlayacak. 28 Haziran'dan sonra, final nakavt eleme aşamasının nasıl çalıştığını size @worldcup-russia hesabından bir post ile bildireceğiz.

Her iki aşamaya da herkes katılabilir ve kazananlar her iki etabın puanlama toplamına göre kararlaştırılacaktır.

Herkese bol şans dileriz !
ve tahminleriniz başlasın!

### Katilma postlarinizi 14 Haziran 2018 tarihi saat 00:01 UTC kadar yazabilirsiniz.

---

Bu bir @blocktrades sponsorlu yarışmadır, eğer @blocktrades'in yaptığını seviyorsanız, [buraya tiklayarak](https://steemit.com/~witnesses) @blocktrades için witness oy verebilirsiniz.

Bu bir @acidyo & @anomadsoul organize yarışmasıdır, eğer bu yaptıklari etkinligi sevdiseniz, [buraya tiklayarak](https://steemit.com/~witnesses) @ocd-witness'e witnesslik icin oy verebilirsiniz.

</center>

###
ไม่มีการล้อเล่น: 2,000 SBD รางวัลและทุกคนสามารถโพสต์ได้และเข้าร่วมให้สนุกนะครับ!
___________________________________________________________________________________________________ #####
ใน 11 วันเท่านั้นจะมีการแข่งขันกีฬาที่ยิ่งใหญ่ที่สุดในโลกจะเริ่มขึ้น: ฟุตบอลโลกที่มีการเฉลิมฉลองในรัสเซีย
___________________________________________________________________________________________________
![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmc9YKRK9wNg5K9FTkSRjZK5M5naEE9rcwopQ4gY7EXvHv/image.png)
@blocktrades ชอบที่จะสนับสนุนโครงการที่มีส่วนร่วมในชุมชนประเภทนี้และ @acidyo & @anomadsoul รู้ว่า Steemians รักเกมนี้มากดังนั้นเราจึงตัดสินใจที่จะจัดการแข่งขัน Football World Cup ครั้งใหญ่นี้ ___________________________________________________________________________________________________ คุณไม่จำเป็นต้องเป็นนักวิเคราะห์มืออาชีพของเกมทีมชาติของคุณไม่จำเป็นต้องมีส่วนร่วมคุณไม่จำเป็นต้องรู้เรื่องฟุตบอลให้เข้าร่วม ... ทั้งหมดที่คุณต้องทำคือการเขียนโพสต์เลือกผู้ชนะการแข่งขันทุกคนและ Steemian ที่ทำให้คะแนนมากที่สุดชนะ

ง่ายๆเพียงเท่านี้

ใช่มีกฎง่ายๆคือ

RULES

1 - ชื่อเรื่องของคุณต้องเป็น: @blocktrades World Cup | My Selections 2 - ในบทความของคุณคุณต้องใส่ลิงค์เพื่อประกาศนี้ 3 – ใช้รูปแบบที่รวมอยู่ในลิงก์ด้านบนเพื่อให้เราสามารถจัดระเบียบแต่ละรายการได้ 4 - ใช้แท็ก blocktradesworldcup และแท็ก mypicks 5 - Resteem โพสต์นี้ และ [โพสต์นี้](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes) เราต้องการมีหลายร้อย Entries 6 - เมื่อคุณโพสต์คุณไม่สามารถแก้ไขได้ ดังนั้นโปรดคิดว่าเพื่อนของคุณอย่างละเอียดก่อนโพสต์ 7 - ความน่าเชื่อถือขั้นต่ำที่จะเข้าร่วมคือ 40 นี่คือการหลีกเลี่ยงบอทจากการเข้าร่วม 8 - คุณสามารถส่งรายการของคุณได้จนถึง 14 มิถุนายน 2018 เวลา 00:01 น. UTC เขตเวลา

การให้คะแนน: สำหรับการเลือกที่ถูกต้องแต่ละรายการที่คุณทำในกลุ่ม Group คุณจะได้รับคะแนนหนึ่ง (1) ในตอนท้ายของถ้วยสระว่ายน้ำรางวัลจะแบ่งออกเป็นกลุ่มผู้ทำประตูสูงสุด Steemians จำนวน steemians ที่ได้รับรางวัลจะขึ้นอยู่กับจำนวนรายการที่เราได้รับ

___________________________________________________________________________________________________ Hey @blocktrades สิ่งที่เกี่ยวกับขั้นตอนที่สองของถ้วยขั้นตอนKnock Out Stage? Group Stage จะเสร็จสิ้นในวันที่ 28 มิถุนายน (เวลารัสเซีย) และขั้นตอนการพิศวง (Knockout) จะเริ่มขึ้นในวันที่ 30 มิถุนายน ดังนั้นเราจะประกาศด้วยบัญชีนี้หลังจากวันที่ 28 มิถุนายนเพื่อแจ้งให้คุณทราบว่าเวที Knockout ทำงานอย่างไร ทุกคนสามารถเข้าร่วมทั้งสองขั้นตอนและผู้ชนะจะถูกตัดสินโดยผลรวมคะแนนของทั้งสองขั้นตอน ขอให้ทุกคนโชคดีและปล่อยให้การคาดการณ์เริ่มต้นขึ้น!

คุณสามารถส่งรายการของคุณได้จนถึง 14 มิถุนายน 2018 เวลา 00:01 น. ตามเวลา UTC **[ที่นี้](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes)**

Image [Source](https://talksport.com/football/russia-world-cup-2018-fixtures-dates-kick-off-time-stadium-group-stage-match) and [Original Content](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes) of @worldcup-russia
___________________________________________________________________________________________________ นี่คือการประกวดที่สนับสนุน @blocktrades หากคุณต้องการสิ่งที่เขาทำลงคะแนนให้ @blocktrades เป็นพยาน Click [ที่นี้]( https://steemit.com/~witnesses) นี่เป็นการประกวดแบบ @acidyo & @anomadsoul ถ้าคุณชอบสิ่งที่เรากำลังทำอยู่ให้โหวตให้ @ ocd-witness ในฐานะพยาน Click [ที่นี้]( https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

author: arfa
body:
###
Tidak main-main: hadiah besar 2,000 SBD dapat diraih SIAPAPUN dengan membuat postingan yang sangat mudah, bergabung dan bersenang-senanglah!
***
Hanya dalam 14 hari, acara olahraga terbesar di dunia akan dimulai: Piala Dunia Sepak Bola di Rusia ..
https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png
[Source](https://talksport.com/football/russia-world-cup-2018-fixtures-dates-kick-off-time-stadium-group-stage-match)
@blocktrades dengan senang hati mensponsori jenis proyek yang melibatkan komunitas ini dan @acidyo & @anomadsoul tahu, banyak Steemian menyukai permainan ini, jadi kami memutuskan untuk menyelenggarakan kuis Piala Dunia Sepakbola yang sangat besar ini.
Anda tidak perlu menjadi seorang analis profesional, tim nasional Anda tidak harus berpartisipasi, Anda tidak perlu tahu banyak tentang seapk bola untuk dapat bergabung ...
Yang perlu Anda lakukan adalah menulis postingan, memilih setiap pemenang pertandingan dan, Steemian yang membuat poin terbanyak, akan menjadi pemenang.. ##
Sesimpel itu
####
Hai @acidyo , saya ingin mendapat bagian dari 2.000 SBD itu, bagaimana saya bergabung?
Sangat mudah: Di piala dunia ada dua tahap, The Group Stage dan The Knockout Stage . Untuk Group Stage piala @blocktrades ini , yang harus Anda lakukan adalah membuat pos dengan prediksi pertandingan Anda di setiap pertandingan di bawah ini: ####

Yang harus Anda lakukan adalah membuat postingan di mana Anda memasukkan W (untuk menang), L (untuk kalah) dan T (untuk seri) di setiap pertandingan. ##
Jika Anda perlu melihat contoh Cara membuat postingan untuk bergabung dengan Cup Blocktrade, [klik di sini](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@mexico-trail/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections)
Hei @anomadsoul, bagaimana aturannya?
Ya, ada beberapa aturan sederhana untuk berpartisipasi:
##
ATURAN
1 - Judul Postingan Anda harus : The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections 2 - Dalam posting Anda, Anda harus menyertakan tautan ke pengumuman ini.. 3 - Gunakan format yang disertakan dalam tautan di atas sehingga kami dapat mengatur setiap entri. 4 - Gunakan tags blocktradesworldcup dan mypicks 5 - Resteem postingan ini. Kami menginginkan ada ratusan peserta. 6 - Setelah Anda membuat posting, Anda tidak dapat mengeditnya. Jadi silakan pikirkan pilihan Anda dengan seksama sebelum memposting. 7 - Reputasi Minimum untuk berpartisipasi adalah 40. Ini untuk menghindari bot bergabung. 8 - Anda dapat mengirimkan keikutsertaan Anda hingga 14 Juni 2018 pukul 00:01, zona waktu UTC.. ####
PENILAIAN: Untuk setiap pilihan yang benar yang Anda lakukan di Babak Penyisihan Grup , Anda akan diberikan satu (1) poin. Di akhir kejuaraan, hadiah akan dibagi di antara Steemians yang mengumpul poin terbanyak. Jumlah steemian yang dihargai akan bergantung pada jumlah entri yang kami dapatkan.
Hai @blocktrades , bagaimana dengan tahap kedua, babak sistem gugur? Penyisihan Grup selesai pada 28 Juni (waktu Rusia) dan tahap Knockout dimulai pada 30 Juni. Jadi kami akan membuat pengumuman setelah 28 Juni untuk memberi tahu Anda bagaimana tahapan berikutnya. Setiap orang dapat bergabung dalam kedua tahap dan pemenang akan ditentukan oleh jumlah poin dari kedua Tahapan. Selamat mencoba semuanya! ###
Anda dapat mengirimkan entri Anda hingga 14 Juni 2018 pukul 00:01, zona waktu UTC.
Ini adalah kontes yang disponsori @blocktrades, jika Anda menyukai apa yang ia lakukan, pilih @blocktrades sebagai witness [di sini](https://steemit.com/~witnesses) Kontes ini diselenggarakan @acidyo & @anomadsoul , jika Anda menyukai apa yang kami lakukan, berikan suara anda untuk @ocd-witness sebagai witness [di sini](https://steemit.com/~witnesses) *** ###
THANKS FOR VISITING MY BLOG

# AYO JANGAN LEWATKAN

Hadiah total 2.000 SBD !!!! dan siapa yang bisa menulis, dapat bergabung dengan kesenangan ini!

# dalam 14 hari

Olahraga terbesar di dunia akan dimulai: Football World Cup akan diselenggarakan di Rusia.


@blocktrades sangat suka mensponsori proyek yang melibatkan komunitas. Sementara itu, @acidyo & @anomadsoul tahu bahwa banyak Steemian menikmati olahraga ini, jadi mereka memilih untuk mengatur kontes ini untuk acara Piala Dunia 2018.

Anda tidak perlu menjadi penonton sepakbola profesional, tim nasional Anda juga tidak harus terlibat bahkan jika Anda juga tidak perlu tahu banyak tentang sepakbola untuk bergabung ...

Perbaiki untuk menulis dan menemukan setiap pemenang di setiap pertandingan, pemain yang paling sukses untuk menang.

Sangat mudah kan ??
Hehe @acidyo, Bagaimana saya bisa mendapatkan 2000 SBD? Bisakah kamu bergabung?
Sangat mudah: Di Piala Dunia ada dua putaran, Grup Panggung, dan Stadion Knockout.

# Untuk Piala Dunia 2018, Anda harus melakukan ini dengan prediksi permainan dari masing-masing pertandingan berikut:

Kemudian, pemenang harus menulis W (menang, L (KO) dan T (untuk seri) di setiap gim.

Jika Anda ingin melihat contoh cara membuat kiriman untuk bergabung dengan kontes ini, klik tautan ini.
Hei @anomadsoul, apa aturannya?
Ya, ada beberapa aturan:
Peraturan Kontes

1 - Judul posting yang Anda butuhkan: @Blocktrades World Cup | Pilihan saya

2 - Dalam posting Anda, Anda harus memiliki tautan ke posting ini.

3 - Gunakan format yang disediakan di tautan di atas sehingga operator dapat mengelola setiap entri dengan lebih mudah

4 - Gunakan blocktradesworldcup dan tag mypicks

5 - Kirim selesai
https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes. Banyak sekali yang terlibat.

6 - Setelah posting, Anda tidak bisa mengeditnya. Jadi, pikirkan baik-baik tentang pilihan Anda sebelum mengirimnya.

7 - Reputasi Minimum untuk Masuk akan menjadi 40. Ini untuk mencegah penggabungan bot.

8 - Anda dapat memposting ke 14 Juni 2018 pada 00:01, zona waktu UTC.

Rating: Untuk setiap tebakan yang benar yang Anda buat dalam adegan grup, Anda akan mendapatkan satu (1) poin. Pada akhir Piala Dunia 2018, hadiah akan menjadi pemain tertinggi. Jumlah kemenangan akan tergantung pada jumlah yang dikirim.

Hai @blocktrades, tentang paruh kedua Piala, mengalahkan sistem gugur?

Level panggung berakhir pada 28 Juni (waktu Rusia) dan Knockout Stage sejak 30 Juni. Jadi, kami akan mengumumkan akun akun @ worldcup-russia setelah tanggal 28 Juni untuk memberi tahu Anda tentang aturan Knockout yang bulat.

Setiap orang dapat bergabung dalam dua tahap dan pemenang akan ditentukan oleh nomor tulisan Tahap Dua.

Selamat mencoba semua, Mari membangun Piala Dunia 2018 !!

Anda dapat mengirim entri kepada Anda hingga 14 Juni 2018 pukul 00:01, zona waktu UTC.

Kontes ini disponsori oleh @blocktrades, jika Anda suka dengan apa yang mereka lakukan, pilih @ blocktrades sebagai saksi di sini.

Kontes ini diselenggarakan oleh @acidyo & @ anomadsoul, jika Anda suka dengan apa yang Anda lakukan, pilih @ ocd-saksi sebagai saksi di sini

Catatan
Jangan lupa bersihkan postingan ini
https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes

Posting ini adalah terjemahan dari bahasa asli asli: Gabung @blocktrades World Cup | 2.000 SBD dalam Hadiah!

# Selain itu:

> Partisipasi harus dibuat dalam bahasa Inggris untuk mengelola entri - tetapi ini tidak menjadi masalah, karena ada contoh template posting serta panduan untuk bahasa indonesia

body:
Не шутите: 2000 SBD и ЛЮБЫЕ наградные пулы, которые могут сделать сообщение, могут присоединиться к веселью!
Всего за 14 дней начнется крупнейшее в мире спортивное мероприятие: в России отмечается чемпионат мира по футболу.
@blocktrades любит спонсировать проект, в котором участвует это сообщество, и @acidyo & @anomadsoul знает, что многие из Steemian любят эту игру, поэтому мы решили провести этот грандиозный чемпионат мира по футболу.
Вам не обязательно быть профессиональным аналитиком игры, ваша сборная не должна участвовать, вам не нужно много знать о футболе, чтобы присоединиться ...

Все, что вам нужно сделать, это написать сообщение, набирающее каждого победителя матча, и Стемеан, который делает больше очков, выигрывает.

![bola dunia.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcYKrKSnNuVzJJZgpChiAZBxsoRT1fL9oTTuR9sBAq9ua/bola%20dunia.jpg)

Так просто, как
Привет @acidyo, я хочу часть 2000 SBD, как мне присоединиться?
Это легко: в мировом кубке есть два этапа: Stage Stage и Stage Knockout.

Для этого этапа группового этапа кубка @blocktrades все, что вам нужно сделать, это создать пост с предсказаниями матча в каждой из этих игр:

Если вам нужно посмотреть пример Как создать сообщение, чтобы присоединиться к Cup Blocktrade, нажмите здесь
Эй, @anomadsoul, есть правило?
Да, есть несколько простых правил:
ПРАВИЛА
1 - Название вашего сообщения должно быть: The @blocktrades World Cup | Мой выбор

2 - В вашем сообщении вы должны указать ссылку на это объявление.

3 - Используйте формат, указанный в ссылке выше, чтобы мы могли организовать каждую запись.

4- Используйте теги blocktradesworldcup и теги mypicks

5 - Восстановить сообщение. Мы хотим иметь сотни записей.

6 - После создания сообщения вы не можете его редактировать. Поэтому, пожалуйста, подумайте о своем выборе тщательно перед публикацией.

7 - Минимальная репутация для участия - 40. Это делается для того, чтобы не присоединяться к ботам.}

8 - Вы можете подать заявку до 14 июня 2018 года в 00:01, часовой пояс UTC.

Печать: для каждого правильного пикапа, который вы делаете на групповом этапе, вам будет присвоен один (1) балл. В конце кубка приз будет разделен между лучшими бойцами состязаний. Предполагаемое количество участников войны будет зависеть от количества записей, которые мы получаем.
Привет @blocktrades, а как насчет второго этапа Кубка, нокаутом?

Групповой этап завершился 28 июня (русское время) и этап нокаута начинается 30 июня. Поэтому после 28 июня мы объявим об этом аккаунте, чтобы вы знали, как работает этап нокаута.

Каждый человек может участвовать в обоих этапах, и победитель будет определяться количеством баллов с обеих этапов.

Попробуйте и пусть начнутся предсказания!

Вы можете отправить свои сообщения до 14 июня 2018 года в 00:01, часовой пояс UTC.
Это спонсируемый конкурс @blocktrades, если вам нравится, что он делает, выберите @blocktrades в качестве свидетеля здесь

Это организованный конкурс @acidyo & @anomadsoul, если вам нравится, что мы делаем, выберите @ ocd-witness в качестве свидетеля здесь

เฮ้ @anomadsoul มีกฎของหัวแม่มือ?

ใช้แท็ก blocktradeworldcup และแท็ก mypicks

https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes หลายคนมีส่วนร่วม

6 - หลังจากที่คุณสร้างโพสต์แล้วคุณจะไม่สามารถแก้ไขได้ ดังนั้นโปรดคิดอย่างรอบคอบเกี่ยวกับตัวเลือกของคุณก่อนโพสต์

7 - ความน่าเชื่อถือขั้นต่ำที่จะเข้าร่วมคือ 40 นี่คือการหลีกเลี่ยงการเข้าร่วมบอท

8 - คุณสามารถส่งโพสต์ของคุณได้จนถึง 14 มิถุนายน 2018 เวลา 00:01 น. ตามเวลา UTC

คะแนน: สำหรับภาพที่คุณถ่ายในกลุ่มคุณจะได้รับคะแนน (1) ในตอนท้ายของฟุตบอลโลก 2018 จะมีการแบ่งปันรางวัลกับจุดที่น่าสนใจที่สุด จำนวนผู้ชนะของ steemans ขึ้นอยู่กับจำนวนรายการที่เราได้รับ

สวัสดี @ blocktrades สิ่งที่เกี่ยวกับรอบที่สองของถ้วยระบบ knock-out?

การจัดกลุ่มเสร็จสิ้นเมื่อวันที่ 28 มิถุนายน (เวลารัสเซีย) และเริ่มรอบ Knockout ในวันที่ 30 มิถุนายนดังนั้นเราจะประกาศในบัญชี Russia worldcup @ หลังจากวันที่ 28 มิถุนายนเพื่อแจ้งให้คุณทราบเกี่ยวกับนโยบายของ Knockout

แต่ละคนสามารถเข้าร่วมเวทีเดียวกันและผู้ชนะจะถูกกำหนดโดยจำนวนคะแนนจากทั้งสองขั้นตอน

ขอให้ทุกคนโชคดีจงปลุกเร้าฟุตบอลโลก 2018!

คุณสามารถโพสต์รายการของคุณได้จนถึง 14 มิถุนายน 2018 เวลา 00:01 น. เขตเวลา UTC

การประกวดนี้ได้รับการสนับสนุนโดย @ blocktrades หากคุณต้องการสิ่งที่เขาเลือกให้เลือก @blocktrades เป็นพยานที่นี่

การแข่งขันจัดขึ้นที่ @acidyo & @ anomadsoul ถ้าคุณชอบสิ่งที่พวกเขาทำเลือก @ ocd-witness เป็นพยานที่นี่

คำเตือนเล็ก ๆ
อย่าลืมเรียกคืนโพสต์นี้
https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes

โพสต์นี้เป็นการแปลจากข้อความภาษาอังกฤษต้นฉบับ: Join @blocktrades World Cup | 2,000 SBD ในรางวัล!

author: kawaidolphin
body:
안녕하세요. 오늘은 한 가지 이벤트 소식을 전해드리려 합니다. @blocktrades에서 @worldcup-russia와 월드컵 이벤트를 진행합니다. [이벤트 게시글]( https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes)을 번역해서 전해드립니다.
###
누구나 참여할 수 있습니다. 총 상금 2,000 SBD! 재미로 참가해보세요.
14일 이내로 세계 최대의 스포츠 이벤트가 시작 됩니다. 바로 러시아에서 열리는 월드컵이죠.
https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2018/04/23/17/08/football-3344911_960_720.png
[Source](https://talksport.com/football/russia-world-cup-2018-fixtures-dates-kick-off-time-stadium-group-stage-match)
@blocktrades 는 이러한 커뮤니티 타입의 프로젝트를 열렬히 지원합니다. @acidyo 와 @anomadsoul 는 많은 스티미언들이 이러한 이벤트를 좋아한다는 걸 알기에, 다가오는 월드컵에 맞춰 새로운 이벤트를 기획하게 됐습니다.
게임을 분석하는 전문가이실 필요는 없습니다. 여러분의 국가가 월드컵에 참여하지 않아도 괜찮습니다. 축구에 대해 잘 모르셔도 참가하는 데 문제가 없습니다.
각 경기 별로 승자를 골라주시면 됩니다. 가장 많이 적중한 스티미언이 우승을 하게 됩니다. ##
간단 질문
####
@acidyo 님, 2,000 SBD 상금 일부를 받고 싶습니다. 어떻게 참여 하면 되죠?
아주 쉽습니다. 월드컵에는 그룹 조별전과 토너먼트 전이 있죠. @blocktrades 컵의 블록 예선전을 위해서는 경기 예측 결과를 포스팅해주시면 됩니다. 다음 경기에 대해서요: ####
Russia v Saudi Arabia
####
Egypt v Uruguay
####
Morocco v Iran
####
Portugal v Spain
####
France v Australia
####
Argentina v Iceland
####
Peru v Denmark
####
Croatia v Nigeria
####
Costa Rica v Serbia
####
Germany v Mexico
####
Brazil v Switzerland
####
Sweden v South Korea

Belgium v Panama
####
Tunisia v England
####
Poland v Senegal
####
Colombia v Japan
####
Russia v Egypt
####
Portugal v Morocco
####
Uruguay v Saudi Arabia
####
Iran v Spain
####
France v Peru

각 경기별로 승자에게는 W, 패자에게는 L, 무승부에는 T를 입력하시면 됩니다. ##
어떻게 포스팅을 해야하는지 궁금하시다면 여기를 클릭하세요. [click here](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@mexico-trail/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections)
@anomadsoul 님, 다른 규칙이 있나요?
네, 간단한 몇 가지 규칙들이 있습니다:
##
규칙
1 - 포스팅의 제목은 반드시 다음과 같아야 합니다.: The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections 2 - 포스팅에는 본 게시글의 공지 링크가 걸려 있어야 합니다. (영문) 3 - 위에 첨부된 링크의 포맷을 사용해서 참가해주셔야 합니다. 4 - blocktradesworldcup 과 mypicks 태그를 사용해 주세요. 5 - 이 포스팅을 리스팀해주세요. 많은 분들이 참여하길 원합니다. 6 - 한 번 포스팅을 게시한 뒤로는 수정할 수 없습니다. 신중하게 작성해주세요. 7 - 최소 참가 조건은 명성도 40입니다. 봇의 참여를 막기 위함 입니다. 8 - 참가 시기는 2018년 6월 14일, 00:01 a.m. 까지이며 UTC 기준입니다. ####
점수 계산: 그룹 예선전 에서 적중한 예상에 1점을 부여합니다. 대회가 종료된 후 상금은 고득점 스티미언들 사이에서 분배될 것입니다. 보상을 받는 스티미언들은 이벤트에 참여하는 스티미언들의 수에 따라 달라집니다.
@blocktrades 님, 두 번째 스테이지인 토너먼트 경기는요? 조별 경기는 6월 28일(러시아 시간)에 끝나고 6월 30일에 토너먼트 경기가 시작 됩니다. 우리는 28일 이후에 토너먼트 경기에 관련한 이벤트가 어떻게 진행되는지 이 계정으로 발표 할 것입니다. 누구나 두 단계에 참여할 수 있으며 두 단계의 점수 합에 따라 승자가 결정됩니다. 모두에게 행운을 빕니다. ###
2018 년 6 월 14 일 00시 01 분 (UTC 표준 시간대)까지 제출할 수 있습니다.
이것은 @blocktrades가 후원하는 경연 대회입니다. 이 이벤트가 맘에 드신다면 @blocktrades에 증인으로 투표해 주세요. (https://steemit.com/~witnesses) 본 이벤트는 @acidyo 와 @anomadsoul 에 의해 기획된 입네트 입니다. 마음에 드신다면 @ ocd-witness에 증인으로 투표하십시오 (https://steemit.com/~witnesses)

# ☞[상금 2,000SBD 월드컵 승리팀 맞추기 이벤트](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes)
https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcQLsTDKKrJf354VQwNSzSnnAd8hG3KuSJB7mAheyWqto/b_02.png
**이벤트**에 **참여**하기 위해서는~
여러가지 **조건**들이 있는데요~ 
**영어 해석**하기 귀찮고 읽어봐도 뭔말인지 잘 모르겠는분들은
## 그냥 제 포스팅 보고 똑같이 참여하시면 됩니당~
https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcQLsTDKKrJf354VQwNSzSnnAd8hG3KuSJB7mAheyWqto/b_02.png
# ☞[스팀툴 click here](https://tool.steem.world/Post/Content)
위의 **스팀툴**에서 아래의 제 **ULR 주소**를 **입력**하면 베껴쓸 수 있습니다~)
# ☞[@keydon 월드컵 이벤트 따라하기](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@keydon/7uwe9a-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections)
https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcQLsTDKKrJf354VQwNSzSnnAd8hG3KuSJB7mAheyWqto/b_02.png
## 근데~ 승리팀 예상까지 따라하시묜 안돼용~ ㅎㅎ 
**승리팀 예상**은 베껴쓰신 **마크다운**에서~

> # 승리 W
> # 패배 L
> # 무승부 T

이렇게 **작성**하셔서 올리시면 됩니당~ 
**태그**에는 반드시 아래의 **두 태그**가 들어가야 하구요~
#blocktradesworldcup #mypicks
https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcQLsTDKKrJf354VQwNSzSnnAd8hG3KuSJB7mAheyWqto/b_02.png
그리고 한 번 쓴 글을 **수정**할 경우, **기권처리**된다고 하니까~
꼭 바꾸시고 싶으신 분들은~
**수정**하지 말고 그냥 **글**을 다시 쓰세요~
https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmcQLsTDKKrJf354VQwNSzSnnAd8hG3KuSJB7mAheyWqto/b_02.png
그럼 많이들 **참여**하시고~
**코쟁이**들 **스달** 뺏어서~
# 우리도 외화벌이 좀 하자구요~

**리스팀** 좀 부탁드립니다~

author: marpemusic
body:
# The @blocktrades World Cup | My selections
![russia 2018.jpg](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmXDRjFvtQ4dwaQJPzFkbqyanAwDTLNM7pE5Sb8XzkrkMv)
<center>[Source](https://www.fifa.com/worldcup/matches/)</center>
___
The 2018 FIFA World Cup will be the 21st FIFA World Cup. This epochal event is just 9 days away! How time flies!! The long awaited Russia 2018 world cup is upon us!!!
___
<center>**Let's Rumble!!!**</center>
___
Expectations are high, adrenaline's popping up, hearts are racing, Russia 2018 is here. 
> This will be the first World Cup held in Europe since the 2006 tournament in Germany, the first ever to be held in Eastern Europe and the eleventh time that it has been held in Europe.

# [Join the @blocktrades World Cup | 2,000 SBD in Prizes!](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-2-000-sbd-in-prizes) 
<center>https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmT3zyTYrt9DJwFUaZP21ZkfwnWT1Ks6nqhbKGHv1uRA1K</center>
<center>[Source](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@anomadsoul/the-blocktrades-world-cup-or-my-selections)</center>
In the spirit of the excitement and frenzies that this epochal event brings, @blocktrades is sponsoring a contest/giveaway worth 2,000 SBD:
> **You don´t have to be a professional analyst of the game, your national team doesn´t have to participate, you don´t need to know much about Football to join...**
> **All you need to do is write a post picking every match winner and, the Steemian who makes the most points, wins.**
# I am rooting for my Country
<center>https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmeBnDxgBmqTZGNAAFeFe8vDVWV6dM4xy3k5bHQLVTH6vf</center>
<center>[Source](https://www.premiumtimesng.com/sports/football/257922-photos-new-super-eagles-jerseys-unveiled-ahead-world-cup.html)</center>
I gather that Nigeria's jersey (designed by Nike) is the most fashionable in comparison with other squads representing. I believe this will not get our squad foggy headed, I trust that they'll be focused and determined even though they're not favorites to clinch the title.

I am going all in on Nigeria. I predicted a win for Nigeria against Argentina because of the rivalry that exists between both teams. As for Iceland and Croatia, it's a gamble, but I'll give Nigeria a passive win against Iceland.
___

author: mohnasier
body:
The official 32 team squad of 2018 World Cup participants has officially been released. There are some interesting facts from the row of players who will take part in Russia 2018 later.
Good friend steemit This time I will present 7 interesting facts related players who will enliven the title of the 2018 World Cup.

oldest player
Essam El-Hadary (Egypt team)
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/duh3z7ux4w.jpg)
Egypt goalkeeper and captain Essam El-Hadary is the oldest player to take part in the 2018 World Cup. He is now 45 years old. Goalkeeper Al Taawoun FC is six years older than senior Mexican national team player, Rafael Marquez. with his current age, El-Hadary will break the record of the oldest player who played in the World Cup while appearing to defend Egypt later. Currently, the record is still held by Colombian goalkeeper Faryd Mondragon, who appeared for five minutes at the 2014 World Cup in the age of 43 years.

Youngest Player
daniel Arzani (Australian national team)
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/olhrxysi34.jpg)
Daniel Arzani is a shock figure who brought coach Bert van Marwijk to the Australian squad for the 2018 World Cup. New debuted by appearing for 6 minutes when facing the Rep. cheska on June 1, he was able to convince the Dutchman. By the age of 19 years 5 months, Arzani was recorded as the youngest player in the 2018 World Cup. He is 15 days younger than French national team striker Kylian Mbappe. however, for the opportunity to play, of course Arzani lost to Mbappe who is now a core player in Les Bleus.

The heaviest player
Roman Torres (Panama national team)
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/v2eqabc5qi.jpg)
Weighs nearly 1 quintal, exactly 99 kg, Roman Torres is the player with the heaviest weight that competed in the 2018 World Cuphe leads 1 kg from Almuaiouf Abdullah (Saudi Arabia), Jannick Vestegaard (Denmark), and Harry Maguire (England). Torres is a very experienced player in the Panamanian national team. He made his debut with La Merea Roja in 2005.total, to date, the Seattle Sounders central defender has 106 times to strengthen the Panamanian national team and managed to make 10 goals.

Lightest Player
Takashi Inui (Japan team)
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/cok66tp8bn.jpg)
About the lightest weight, Takashi Inui who defended the Japanese national team is at the top. body weight recorded only 59 kg. The newly moved player from Eibar to Real Betis is 1 kg lighter than England's Jesse Lingard. The existence of Inui in the Japanese national team this time somewhat surprising. he is almost absent in all the Asian Zone World Cup qualifying match that dilakoni Samurai Blue Team from 2015 to 2017. Only once he came down, namely during the 2-0 win over Australia.

Highest Player
Lovre Kalinic (Croatian national team)
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/ovjpw7wegs.jpg)
on the mat World Cup 2018, there are only two players with a height of 2 meters. They are Lovre Kalinic, Croatian national team keeper, and Jannik Vestergaard, central defender of the Danish national team. However, Kalinic is the highest, which is 201 cm. He was 1 cm ahead of Vestergaard.
about the opportunity to play in Russia 2018, Vestergaard can be said more likely. As a defender, although not a top choice, he is more likely to play down. As for Kalinic have handicap in the form of status that only second goalkeeper. in the Croatian national team, Danijel Subasic is still a mainstay under the crossbar.

Shortest Players
Xherdan Shaqiri (Swiss team)
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/aqyxqco6rf.jpg)
Small chili pepper. Although only 165 cm tall, Xherdan Shaqiri (Switzerland) is a mainstay in the Swiss national team In the 2018 World Cup later,

Top Players Player Club: Manchester City
 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/k15cvsuc36.jpg)
Not Real Madrid, Barcelona or Bayern Munich. On the mat World Cup this time, the club with the most number of players is Manchester City. Premier League champions are contributing 16 players, one player ahead of Madrid. a total of 16 players from one club in one edition is a new record in the World Cup.

Of the 16 players scattered in 8 teams, namely Argentina (2), Brazil (4), Spain (1), England (4), Belgium (2), Portugal (1), France (1), and Germany (1) . if only Leroy Sane was not dropped from the squad of Germany, the number of players The Citizens certainly more .

Follow me @mohnasier

author: the-alien
body:
![Alt Text](http://gennext.broncolor.com/imgservice/0001/1/750/fileadmin/upload_media/blog/main.jpg)

The world cup is upon us. T-4 days, the clock is ticking and we just can’t wait for the official kick-off.

I love the world cup. Which makes me a walking and breathing paradox since I couldn’t care less about flags, borders and all that jazz.

But I do love the world cup.

Something you probably might not know about me is that I’m a big football fan. I played a lot in my childhood and my teenage years, and even though I still follow the sport, I never write about it. Maybe I should.

But first, I need to give thanks to @blocktrades, @acidyo and @anomadsoul. Thank you guys for this awesome challenge!

Let's face it, contests are fun, and they bring us together. For anyone who is just catching up, make sure to check [this post](https://steemit.com/blocktradesworldcup/@worldcup-russia/you-still-have-time-join-the-blocktrades-world-cup-and-win-2-000-sbd-in-prizes) to participate in this cool steemit contest with 2000 SBD in prizes.

author: exqueila
body:
###
Bienvenidos mis estimados amigos de Steemit:
![Mundial.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmeVVMpCSrSs4LTtoBcdfeqZ59bxrqPpoYSfoBQBeFYbZy/Mundial.jpg)
En esta oportunidad nos unimos todos los países del mundo, con una emoción que nos paraliza a todos como es el mundial de Futbol de Russia 2018, incluso países como el nuestro que nunca ha tenido la suerte de participar en este maravilloso evento, igualmente se contagia y se vive el futbol como si nuestra selección tuviera presente, además soy de una ciudad de Venezuela que es futbolística por excelencia, como lo es el Estado Mérida, y es más que eso mis padres son amantes del deporte rey, y particularmente comienzo a creer que es una pasión que nace o surge como en los genes o la genética, porque es un apasionamiento hacia este deporte, en casa desde el mas viejo hasta el mas pequeño, tal es el caso de mi hijo sebastián de 8 años le encanta y no solo es ver el futbol es conocer del futbol que es otro nivel. ![futbol.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmXyyqU1UkSYhPdDT5JN7cTk2bRWDgrEw7dVf2F46uDw79/futbol.jpg) A pocos días del inicio del mundial, y la expectativa crece por conocer la selección que se a llevar la anhelada copa del mundo, por eso aplaudo al creador de este brillante concurso como lo es @blocktrades, y también a dos grandes como lo es @anomadsoul y @acidyo, por seguir los pasos de este magno evento, son muy creativos porque nos ponen a volar la imaginación de cada uno de nosotros que formamos parte de esta gran familia de Steemit, para predecir los marcadores de cada uno de los juegos y adicional a ello vamos a ser premiados, que lo hace más atractivo. ![MUNDIAL Russia 2018.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmQPC5tAropWJGhn71NCxE4TAp5r68cBkpwrmvVnV4Mh3m/MUNDIAL%20Russia%202018.jpg) A continuación haré mención de las reglas del concurso : ###
Reglas
1 - El título de tu post debe ser: La copa mundial @blocktrades | Mis predicciones 2 -En tu post, debes incluir un link al anuncio original en inglés. Este es el post 3 - Utiliza el formato incluido en el link un poco más arriba para que la organización sea más sencilla para nosotros. 4 - Usa las etiqueta blocktradesworldcup y la etiqueta mypicks 5 - Da resteem al post original en inglés. Queremos cientos de entradas. Este es el post 6 - Una vez que publiques tu post, no puedes editarlo. Así que piensa muy bien tus predicciones antes de publicar tu post. 7 - La reputación mínima para participar es 40. Esto es para evitar que participen bots. 8 - Puedes participar hasta Junio 14de 2018 a las 00:01 am, UTC
Ahora sí vamos a la parte más emocionante, como es predecir quienes van a ser los ganadores, de los juegos de la primera ronda, es muy sencillo lo que debes hacer es poner W (para victoria) L (para derrota) o T (para empate en cada juego. @blocktrades loves to sponsor this type of community engaging projects and @anomadsoul & @acidyo know a lot of Steemians love this game, so we decided to organize this enormous Football World Cup event.
